GE07bhgce__u:2: māmakāḥ pāṇḍavāś caiva kim akurvata saṃjaya Bhg_01.001c [=MBh_06,023.001c]
GE07bhgce__u:4: dṛṣṭvā tu pāṇḍavānīkaṃ vyūḍhaṃ duryodhanas tadā Bhg_01.002a
GE07bhgce__u:5: ācāryam upasaṃgamya rājā vacanam abravīt Bhg_01.002c [=MBh_06,023.002c]
GE07bhgce__u:6: paśyaitāṃ pāṇḍuputrāṇām ācārya mahatīṃ camūm Bhg_01.003a
GE07bhgce__u:7: vyūḍhāṃ drupadaputreṇa tava śiṣyeṇa dhīmatā Bhg_01.003c [=MBh_06,023.003c]
GE07bhgce__u:8: atra śūrā maheṣvāsā bhīmārjunasamā yudhi Bhg_01.004a [=MBh_06,023.004a]
GE07bhgce__u:9: yuyudhāno virāṭaś ca drupadaś ca mahārathaḥ Bhg_01.004c [=MBh_06,023.004c]
GE07bhgce__u:10: dhṛṣṭaketuś cekitānaḥ kāśirājaś ca vīryavān Bhg_01.005a [=MBh_06,023.005a]
GE07bhgce__u:11: purujit kuntibhojaś ca śaibyaś ca narapuṃgavaḥ Bhg_01.005c
GE07bhgce__u:12: yudhāmanyuś ca vikrānta uttamaujāś ca vīryavān Bhg_01.006a
GE07bhgce__u:13: saubhadro draupadeyāś ca sarva eva mahārathāḥ Bhg_01.006c
GE07bhgce__u:14: asmākaṃ tu viśiṣṭā ye tān nibodha dvijottama Bhg_01.007a
GE07bhgce__u:15: nāyakā mama sainyasya saṃjñārthaṃ tān bravīmi te Bhg_01.007c
GE07bhgce__u:16: bhavān bhīṣmaś ca karṇaś ca kṛpaś ca samitiṃjayaḥ Bhg_01.008a
GE07bhgce__u:17: aśvatthāmā vikarṇaś ca saumadattis tathaiva ca Bhg_01.008c
GE07bhgce__u:18: anye ca bahavaḥ śūrā madarthe tyaktajīvitāḥ Bhg_01.009a [=MBh_06,023.009a]
GE07bhgce__u:20: aparyāptaṃ tad asmākaṃ balaṃ bhīṣmābhirakṣitam Bhg_01.010a
GE07bhgce__u:21: paryāptaṃ tv idam eteṣāṃ balaṃ bhīmābhirakṣitam Bhg_01.010c
GE07bhgce__u:22: ayaneṣu ca sarveṣu yathābhāgam avasthitāḥ Bhg_01.011a [=MBh_06,023.011a]
GE07bhgce__u:23: bhīṣmam evābhirakṣantu bhavantaḥ sarva eva hi Bhg_01.011c
GE07bhgce__u:24: tasya saṃjanayan harṣaṃ kuruvṛddhaḥ pitāmahaḥ Bhg_01.012a
GE07bhgce__u:25: siṃhanādaṃ vinadyoccaiḥ śaṅkhaṃ dadhmau pratāpavān Bhg_01.012c
GE07bhgce__u:26: tataḥ śaṅkhāś ca bheryaś ca paṇavānakagomukhāḥ Bhg_01.013a
GE07bhgce__u:28: tataḥ śvetair hayair yukte mahati syandane sthitau Bhg_01.014a
GE07bhgce__u:29: mādhavaḥ pāṇḍavaś caiva divyau śaṅkhau pradadhmatuḥ Bhg_01.014c
GE07bhgce__u:31: pauṇḍraṃ dadhmau mahāśaṅkhaṃ bhīmakarmā vṛkodaraḥ Bhg_01.015c
GE07bhgce__u:34: kāśyaś ca parameṣvāsaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca mahārathaḥ Bhg_01.017a
GE07bhgce__u:35: dhṛṣṭadyumno virāṭaś ca sātyakiś cāparājitaḥ Bhg_01.017c
GE07bhgce__u:36: drupado draupadeyāś ca sarvaśaḥ pṛthivīpate Bhg_01.018a [=MBh_06,023.018a]
GE07bhgce__u:37: saubhadraś ca mahābāhuḥ śaṅkhān dadhmuḥ pṛthak pṛthak Bhg_01.018c
GE07bhgce__u:38: sa ghoṣo dhārtarāṣṭrāṇāṃ hṛdayāni vyadārayat Bhg_01.019a
GE07bhgce__u:39: nabhaś ca pṛthivīṃ caiva tumulo vyanunādayan Bhg_01.019c
GE07bhgce__u:40: atha vyavasthitān dṛṣṭvā dhārtarāṣṭrān kapidhvajaḥ Bhg_01.020a
GE07bhgce__u:41: pravṛtte śastrasaṃpāte dhanur udyamya pāṇḍavaḥ Bhg_01.020c
GE07bhgce__u:42: hṛṣīkeśaṃ tadā vākyam idam āha mahīpate Bhg_01.021a [=MBh_06,023.021a]
GE07bhgce__u:43: senayor ubhayor madhye rathaṃ sthāpaya me 'cyuta Bhg_01.021c
GE07bhgce__u:44: yāvad etān nirīkṣe 'haṃ yoddhukāmān avasthitān Bhg_01.022a
GE07bhgce__u:45: kair mayā saha yoddhavyam asmin raṇasamudyame Bhg_01.022c
GE07bhgce__u:46: yotsyamānān avekṣe 'haṃ ya ete 'tra samāgatāḥ Bhg_01.023a
GE07bhgce__u:48: evam ukto hṛṣīkeśo guḍākeśena bhārata Bhg_01.024a [=MBh_06,023.024a]
GE07bhgce__u:49: senayor ubhayor madhye sthāpayitvā rathottamam Bhg_01.024c
GE07bhgce__u:51: uvāca pārtha paśyaitān samavetān kurūn iti Bhg_01.025c [=MBh_06,023.025c]
GE07bhgce__u:52: tatrāpaśyat sthitān pārthaḥ pitṝn atha pitāmahān Bhg_01.026a
GE07bhgce__u:53: ācāryān mātulān bhrātṝn putrān pautrān sakhīṃs tathā Bhg_01.026c
GE07bhgce__u:54: śvaśurān suhṛdaś caiva senayor ubhayor api Bhg_01.027a [=MBh_06,023.027a]
GE07bhgce__u:55: tān samīkṣya sa kaunteyaḥ sarvān bandhūn avasthitān Bhg_01.027c
GE07bhgce__u:56: kṛpayā parayāviṣṭo viṣīdann idam abravīt Bhg_01.028a [=MBh_06,023.028a]
GE07bhgce__u:57: dṛṣṭvemān svajanān kṛṣṇa yuyutsūn samavasthitān Bhg_01.028c
GE07bhgce__u:58: sīdanti mama gātrāṇi mukhaṃ ca pariśuṣyati Bhg_01.029a [=MBh_06,023.029a]
GE07bhgce__u:59: vepathuś ca śarīre me romaharṣaś ca jāyate Bhg_01.029c [=MBh_06,023.029c]
GE07bhgce__u:60: gāṇḍīvaṃ sraṃsate hastāt tvak caiva paridahyate Bhg_01.030a
GE07bhgce__u:61: na ca śaknomy avasthātuṃ bhramatīva ca me manaḥ Bhg_01.030c
GE07bhgce__u:62: nimittāni ca paśyāmi viparītāni keśava Bhg_01.031a [=MBh_06,023.031a]
GE07bhgce__u:63: na ca śreyo 'nupaśyāmi hatvā svajanam āhave Bhg_01.031c [=MBh_06,023.031c]
GE07bhgce__u:64: na kāṅkṣe vijayaṃ kṛṣṇa na ca rājyaṃ sukhāni ca Bhg_01.032a
GE07bhgce__u:65: kiṃ no rājyena govinda kiṃ bhogair jīvitena vā Bhg_01.032c
GE07bhgce__u:66: yeṣām arthe kāṅkṣitaṃ no rājyaṃ bhogāḥ sukhāni ca Bhg_01.033a
GE07bhgce__u:67: ta ime 'vasthitā yuddhe prāṇāṃs tyaktvā dhanāni ca Bhg_01.033c
GE07bhgce__u:68: ācāryāḥ pitaraḥ putrās tathaiva ca pitāmahāḥ Bhg_01.034a
GE07bhgce__u:69: mātulāḥ śvaśurāḥ pautrāḥ syālāḥ saṃbandhinas tathā Bhg_01.034c
GE07bhgce__u:70: etān na hantum icchāmi ghnato 'pi madhusūdana Bhg_01.035a
GE07bhgce__u:71: api trailokyarājyasya hetoḥ kiṃ nu mahīkṛte Bhg_01.035c [=MBh_06,023.035c]
GE07bhgce__u:72: nihatya dhārtarāṣṭrān naḥ kā prītiḥ syāj janārdana Bhg_01.036a
GE07bhgce__u:73: pāpam evāśrayed asmān hatvaitān ātatāyinaḥ Bhg_01.036c [=MBh_06,023.036c]
GE07bhgce__u:74: tasmān nārhā vayaṃ hantuṃ dhārtarāṣṭrān sabāndhavān Bhg_01.037a
GE07bhgce__u:75: svajanaṃ hi kathaṃ hatvā sukhinaḥ syāma mādhava Bhg_01.037c
GE07bhgce__u:76: yady apy ete na paśyanti lobhopahatacetasaḥ Bhg_01.038a [=MBh_06,023.038a]
GE07bhgce__u:77: kulakṣayakṛtaṃ doṣaṃ mitradrohe ca pātakam Bhg_01.038c [=MBh_06,023.038c]
GE07bhgce__u:78: kathaṃ na jñeyam asmābhiḥ pāpād asmān nivartitum Bhg_01.039a
GE07bhgce__u:81: dharme naṣṭe kulaṃ kṛtsnam adharmo 'bhibhavaty uta Bhg_01.040c
GE07bhgce__u:83: strīṣu duṣṭāsu vārṣṇeya jāyate varṇasaṃkaraḥ Bhg_01.041c
GE07bhgce__u:84: saṃkaro narakāyaiva kulaghnānāṃ kulasya ca Bhg_01.042a [=MBh_06,023.042a]
GE07bhgce__u:85: patanti pitaro hy eṣāṃ luptapiṇḍodakakriyāḥ Bhg_01.042c [=MBh_06,023.042c]
GE07bhgce__u:87: utsādyante jātidharmāḥ kuladharmāś ca śāśvatāḥ Bhg_01.043c
GE07bhgce__u:89: narake niyataṃ vāso bhavatīty anuśuśruma Bhg_01.044c [=MBh_06,023.044c]
GE07bhgce__u:90: aho bata mahat pāpaṃ kartuṃ vyavasitā vayam Bhg_01.045a [=MBh_06,023.045a]
GE07bhgce__u:91: yad rājyasukhalobhena hantuṃ svajanam udyatāḥ Bhg_01.045c
GE07bhgce__u:92: yadi mām apratīkāram aśastraṃ śastrapāṇayaḥ Bhg_01.046a [=MBh_06,023.046a]
GE07bhgce__u:93: dhārtarāṣṭrā raṇe hanyus tan me kṣemataraṃ bhavet Bhg_01.046c
GE07bhgce__u:94: evam uktvārjunaḥ saṃkhye rathopastha upāviśat Bhg_01.047a
GE07bhgce__u:98: viṣīdantam idaṃ vākyam uvāca madhusūdanaḥ Bhg_02.001c [=MBh_06,024.001c]
GE07bhgce__u:100: kutas tvā kaśmalam idaṃ viṣame samupasthitam Bhg_02.002a
GE07bhgce__u:102: klaibyaṃ mā sma gamaḥ pārtha naitat tvayy upapadyate Bhg_02.003a
GE07bhgce__u:105: kathaṃ bhīṣmam ahaṃ saṃkhye droṇaṃ ca madhusūdana Bhg_02.004a
GE07bhgce__u:107: gurūn ahatvā hi mahānubhāvāñ; śreyo bhoktuṃ bhaikṣam apīha loke Bhg_02.005a [=MBh_06,024.005a]
GE07bhgce__u:108: hatvārthakāmāṃs tu gurūn ihaiva; bhuñjīya bhogān rudhirapradigdhān
GE07bhgce__u:109: na caitad vidmaḥ kataran no garīyo; yad vā jayema yadi vā no jayeyuḥ
GE07bhgce__u:110: yān eva hatvā na jijīviṣāmas; te 'vasthitāḥ pramukhe dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ Bhg_02.006c [=MBh_06,024.006c]
GE07bhgce__u:112: yac chreyaḥ syān niścitaṃ brūhi tan me; śiṣyas te 'haṃ śādhi māṃ tvāṃ
GE07bhgce__u:114: na hi prapaśyāmi mamāpanudyād; yac chokam ucchoṣaṇam indriyāṇām
GE07bhgce__u:115: avāpya bhūmāv asapatnam ṛddhaṃ; rājyaṃ surāṇām api cādhipatyam Bhg_02.008c
GE07bhgce__u:117: evam uktvā hṛṣīkeśaṃ guḍākeśaḥ paraṃtapa Bhg_02.009a [=MBh_06,024.009a]
GE07bhgce__u:118: na yotsya iti govindam uktvā tūṣṇīṃ babhūva ha Bhg_02.009c
GE07bhgce__u:119: tam uvāca hṛṣīkeśaḥ prahasann iva bhārata Bhg_02.010a [=MBh_06,024.010a]
GE07bhgce__u:120: senayor ubhayor madhye viṣīdantam idaṃ vacaḥ Bhg_02.010c
GE07bhgce__u:122: aśocyān anvaśocas tvaṃ prajñāvādāṃś ca bhāṣase Bhg_02.011a
GE07bhgce__u:123: gatāsūn agatāsūṃś ca nānuśocanti paṇḍitāḥ Bhg_02.011c [=MBh_06,024.011c]
GE07bhgce__u:124: na tv evāhaṃ jātu nāsaṃ na tvaṃ neme janādhipāḥ Bhg_02.012a
GE07bhgce__u:125: na caiva na bhaviṣyāmaḥ sarve vayam ataḥ param Bhg_02.012c
GE07bhgce__u:126: dehino 'smin yathā dehe kaumāraṃ yauvanaṃ jarā Bhg_02.013a
GE07bhgce__u:127: tathā dehāntaraprāptir dhīras tatra na muhyati Bhg_02.013c
GE07bhgce__u:130: yaṃ hi na vyathayanty ete puruṣaṃ puruṣarṣabha Bhg_02.015a
GE07bhgce__u:132: nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ Bhg_02.016a [=MBh_06,024.016a]
GE07bhgce__u:133: ubhayor api dṛṣṭo 'ntas tv anayos tattvadarśibhiḥ Bhg_02.016c
GE07bhgce__u:134: avināśi tu tad viddhi yena sarvam idaṃ tatam Bhg_02.017a
GE07bhgce__u:135: vināśam avyayasyāsya na kaś cit kartum arhati Bhg_02.017c
GE07bhgce__u:136: antavanta ime dehā nityasyoktāḥ śarīriṇaḥ Bhg_02.018a [=MBh_06,024.018a]
GE07bhgce__u:138: ya enaṃ vetti hantāraṃ yaś cainaṃ manyate hatam Bhg_02.019a
GE07bhgce__u:139: ubhau tau na vijānīto nāyaṃ hanti na hanyate Bhg_02.019c
GE07bhgce__u:140: na jāyate mriyate vā kadā cin; nāyaṃ bhūtvā bhavitā vā na bhūyaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:141: ajo nityaḥ śāśvato 'yaṃ purāṇo; na hanyate hanyamāne śarīre Bhg_02.020c
GE07bhgce__u:142: vedāvināśinaṃ nityaṃ ya enam ajam avyayam Bhg_02.021a [=MBh_06,024.021a]
GE07bhgce__u:143: kathaṃ sa puruṣaḥ pārtha kaṃ ghātayati hanti kam Bhg_02.021c
GE07bhgce__u:144: vāsāṃsi jīrṇāni yathā vihāya; navāni gṛhṇāti naro 'parāṇi Bhg_02.022a
GE07bhgce__u:145: tathā śarīrāṇi vihāya jīrṇāny; anyāni saṃyāti navāni dehī Bhg_02.022c
GE07bhgce__u:146: nainaṃ chindanti śastrāṇi nainaṃ dahati pāvakaḥ Bhg_02.023a
GE07bhgce__u:147: na cainaṃ kledayanty āpo na śoṣayati mārutaḥ Bhg_02.023c
GE07bhgce__u:148: acchedyo 'yam adāhyo 'yam akledyo 'śoṣya eva ca Bhg_02.024a
GE07bhgce__u:149: nityaḥ sarvagataḥ sthāṇur acalo 'yaṃ sanātanaḥ Bhg_02.024c
GE07bhgce__u:151: tasmād evaṃ viditvainaṃ nānuśocitum arhasi Bhg_02.025c [=MBh_06,024.025c]
GE07bhgce__u:152: atha cainaṃ nityajātaṃ nityaṃ vā manyase mṛtam Bhg_02.026a
GE07bhgce__u:153: tathāpi tvaṃ mahābāho nainaṃ śocitum arhasi Bhg_02.026c [=MBh_06,024.026c]
GE07bhgce__u:154: jātasya hi dhruvo mṛtyur dhruvaṃ janma mṛtasya ca Bhg_02.027a
GE07bhgce__u:155: tasmād aparihārye 'rthe na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi Bhg_02.027c
GE07bhgce__u:157: avyaktanidhanāny eva tatra kā paridevanā Bhg_02.028c [=MBh_06,024.028c]
GE07bhgce__u:158: āścaryavat paśyati kaś cid enam; āścaryavad vadati tathaiva cānyaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:159: āścaryavac cainam anyaḥ śṛṇoti; śrutvāpy enaṃ veda na caiva kaś cit
GE07bhgce__u:160: dehī nityam avadhyo 'yaṃ dehe sarvasya bhārata Bhg_02.030a
GE07bhgce__u:161: tasmāt sarvāṇi bhūtāni na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi Bhg_02.030c
GE07bhgce__u:162: svadharmam api cāvekṣya na vikampitum arhasi Bhg_02.031a
GE07bhgce__u:163: dharmyād dhi yuddhāc chreyo 'nyat kṣatriyasya na vidyate Bhg_02.031c
GE07bhgce__u:165: sukhinaḥ kṣatriyāḥ pārtha labhante yuddham īdṛśam Bhg_02.032c
GE07bhgce__u:166: atha cet tvam imaṃ dharmyaṃ saṃgrāmaṃ na kariṣyasi Bhg_02.033a
GE07bhgce__u:167: tataḥ svadharmaṃ kīrtiṃ ca hitvā pāpam avāpsyasi Bhg_02.033c
GE07bhgce__u:168: akīrtiṃ cāpi bhūtāni kathayiṣyanti te 'vyayām Bhg_02.034a
GE07bhgce__u:170: bhayād raṇād uparataṃ maṃsyante tvāṃ mahārathāḥ Bhg_02.035a
GE07bhgce__u:171: yeṣāṃ ca tvaṃ bahumato bhūtvā yāsyasi lāghavam Bhg_02.035c
GE07bhgce__u:172: avācyavādāṃś ca bahūn vadiṣyanti tavāhitāḥ Bhg_02.036a [=MBh_06,024.036a]
GE07bhgce__u:173: nindantas tava sāmarthyaṃ tato duḥkhataraṃ nu kim Bhg_02.036c
GE07bhgce__u:174: hato vā prāpsyasi svargaṃ jitvā vā bhokṣyase mahīm Bhg_02.037a
GE07bhgce__u:175: tasmād uttiṣṭha kaunteya yuddhāya kṛtaniścayaḥ Bhg_02.037c
GE07bhgce__u:176: sukhaduḥkhe same kṛtvā lābhālābhau jayājayau Bhg_02.038a
GE07bhgce__u:177: tato yuddhāya yujyasva naivaṃ pāpam avāpsyasi Bhg_02.038c
GE07bhgce__u:178: eṣā te 'bhihitā sāṃkhye buddhir yoge tv imāṃ śṛṇu Bhg_02.039a
GE07bhgce__u:179: buddhyā yukto yayā pārtha karmabandhaṃ prahāsyasi Bhg_02.039c
GE07bhgce__u:181: svalpam apy asya dharmasya trāyate mahato bhayāt Bhg_02.040c
GE07bhgce__u:183: bahuśākhā hy anantāś ca buddhayo 'vyavasāyinām Bhg_02.041c
GE07bhgce__u:184: yām imāṃ puṣpitāṃ vācaṃ pravadanty avipaścitaḥ Bhg_02.042a
GE07bhgce__u:185: vedavādaratāḥ pārtha nānyad astīti vādinaḥ Bhg_02.042c [=MBh_06,024.042c]
GE07bhgce__u:189: vyavasāyātmikā buddhiḥ samādhau na vidhīyate Bhg_02.044c
GE07bhgce__u:192: yāvān artha udapāne sarvataḥ saṃplutodake Bhg_02.046a [=MBh_06,024.046a]
GE07bhgce__u:193: tāvān sarveṣu vedeṣu brāhmaṇasya vijānataḥ Bhg_02.046c [=MBh_06,024.046c]
GE07bhgce__u:194: karmaṇy evādhikāras te mā phaleṣu kadā cana Bhg_02.047a [=MBh_06,024.047a]
GE07bhgce__u:195: mā karmaphalahetur bhūr mā te saṅgo 'stv akarmaṇi Bhg_02.047c
GE07bhgce__u:196: yogasthaḥ kuru karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā dhanaṃjaya Bhg_02.048a
GE07bhgce__u:197: siddhyasiddhyoḥ samo bhūtvā samatvaṃ yoga ucyate Bhg_02.048c
GE07bhgce__u:198: dūreṇa hy avaraṃ karma buddhiyogād dhanaṃjaya Bhg_02.049a
GE07bhgce__u:199: buddhau śaraṇam anviccha kṛpaṇāḥ phalahetavaḥ Bhg_02.049c
GE07bhgce__u:201: tasmād yogāya yujyasva yogaḥ karmasu kauśalam Bhg_02.050c
GE07bhgce__u:202: karmajaṃ buddhiyuktā hi phalaṃ tyaktvā manīṣiṇaḥ Bhg_02.051a
GE07bhgce__u:204: yadā te mohakalilaṃ buddhir vyatitariṣyati Bhg_02.052a [=MBh_06,024.052a]
GE07bhgce__u:205: tadā gantāsi nirvedaṃ śrotavyasya śrutasya ca Bhg_02.052c
GE07bhgce__u:206: śrutivipratipannā te yadā sthāsyati niścalā Bhg_02.053a [=MBh_06,024.053a]
GE07bhgce__u:207: samādhāv acalā buddhis tadā yogam avāpsyasi Bhg_02.053c [=MBh_06,024.053c]
GE07bhgce__u:209: sthitaprajñasya kā bhāṣā samādhisthasya keśava Bhg_02.054a
GE07bhgce__u:210: sthitadhīḥ kiṃ prabhāṣeta kim āsīta vrajeta kim Bhg_02.054c
GE07bhgce__u:212: prajahāti yadā kāmān sarvān pārtha manogatān Bhg_02.055a
GE07bhgce__u:213: ātmany evātmanā tuṣṭaḥ sthitaprajñas tadocyate Bhg_02.055c
GE07bhgce__u:216: yaḥ sarvatrānabhisnehas tat tat prāpya śubhāśubham Bhg_02.057a
GE07bhgce__u:217: nābhinandati na dveṣṭi tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā Bhg_02.057c
GE07bhgce__u:218: yadā saṃharate cāyaṃ kūrmo 'ṅgānīva sarvaśaḥ Bhg_02.058a
GE07bhgce__u:221: rasavarjaṃ raso 'py asya paraṃ dṛṣṭvā nivartate Bhg_02.059c
GE07bhgce__u:222: yatato hy api kaunteya puruṣasya vipaścitaḥ Bhg_02.060a [=MBh_06,024.060a]
GE07bhgce__u:223: indriyāṇi pramāthīni haranti prasabhaṃ manaḥ Bhg_02.060c
GE07bhgce__u:224: tāni sarvāṇi saṃyamya yukta āsīta matparaḥ Bhg_02.061a [=MBh_06,024.061a]
GE07bhgce__u:225: vaśe hi yasyendriyāṇi tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā Bhg_02.061c
GE07bhgce__u:226: dhyāyato viṣayān puṃsaḥ saṅgas teṣūpajāyate Bhg_02.062a [=MBh_06,024.062a]
GE07bhgce__u:227: saṅgāt saṃjāyate kāmaḥ kāmāt krodho 'bhijāyate Bhg_02.062c
GE07bhgce__u:228: krodhād bhavati saṃmohaḥ saṃmohāt smṛtivibhramaḥ Bhg_02.063a
GE07bhgce__u:230: rāgadveṣaviyuktais tu viṣayān indriyaiś caran Bhg_02.064a
GE07bhgce__u:233: prasannacetaso hy āśu buddhiḥ paryavatiṣṭhate Bhg_02.065c
GE07bhgce__u:234: nāsti buddhir ayuktasya na cāyuktasya bhāvanā Bhg_02.066a
GE07bhgce__u:235: na cābhāvayataḥ śāntir aśāntasya kutaḥ sukham Bhg_02.066c
GE07bhgce__u:236: indriyāṇāṃ hi caratāṃ yan mano 'nuvidhīyate Bhg_02.067a [=MBh_06,024.067a]
GE07bhgce__u:237: tad asya harati prajñāṃ vāyur nāvam ivāmbhasi Bhg_02.067c
GE07bhgce__u:238: tasmād yasya mahābāho nigṛhītāni sarvaśaḥ Bhg_02.068a [=MBh_06,024.068a]
GE07bhgce__u:240: yā niśā sarvabhūtānāṃ tasyāṃ jāgarti saṃyamī Bhg_02.069a
GE07bhgce__u:241: yasyāṃ jāgrati bhūtāni sā niśā paśyato muneḥ Bhg_02.069c
GE07bhgce__u:242: āpūryamāṇam acalapratiṣṭhaṃ; samudram āpaḥ praviśanti yadvat Bhg_02.070a
GE07bhgce__u:243: tadvat kāmā yaṃ praviśanti sarve; sa śāntim āpnoti na kāmakāmī Bhg_02.070c
GE07bhgce__u:244: vihāya kāmān yaḥ sarvān pumāṃś carati niḥspṛhaḥ Bhg_02.071a
GE07bhgce__u:245: nirmamo nirahaṃkāraḥ sa śāntim adhigacchati Bhg_02.071c [=MBh_06,024.071c]
GE07bhgce__u:246: eṣā brāhmī sthitiḥ pārtha naināṃ prāpya vimuhyati Bhg_02.072a
GE07bhgce__u:249: jyāyasī cet karmaṇas te matā buddhir janārdana Bhg_03.001a
GE07bhgce__u:250: tat kiṃ karmaṇi ghore māṃ niyojayasi keśava Bhg_03.001c [=MBh_06,025.001c]
GE07bhgce__u:251: vyāmiśreṇaiva vākyena buddhiṃ mohayasīva me Bhg_03.002a [=MBh_06,025.002a]
GE07bhgce__u:252: tad ekaṃ vada niścitya yena śreyo 'ham āpnuyām Bhg_03.002c
GE07bhgce__u:254: loke 'smin dvividhā niṣṭhā purā proktā mayānagha Bhg_03.003a
GE07bhgce__u:256: na karmaṇām anārambhān naiṣkarmyaṃ puruṣo 'śnute Bhg_03.004a
GE07bhgce__u:257: na ca saṃnyasanād eva siddhiṃ samadhigacchati Bhg_03.004c
GE07bhgce__u:258: na hi kaś cit kṣaṇam api jātu tiṣṭhaty akarmakṛt Bhg_03.005a
GE07bhgce__u:259: kāryate hy avaśaḥ karma sarvaḥ prakṛtijair guṇaiḥ Bhg_03.005c
GE07bhgce__u:260: karmendriyāṇi saṃyamya ya āste manasā smaran Bhg_03.006a
GE07bhgce__u:261: indriyārthān vimūḍhātmā mithyācāraḥ sa ucyate Bhg_03.006c
GE07bhgce__u:262: yas tv indriyāṇi manasā niyamyārabhate 'rjuna Bhg_03.007a
GE07bhgce__u:263: karmendriyaiḥ karmayogam asaktaḥ sa viśiṣyate Bhg_03.007c
GE07bhgce__u:264: niyataṃ kuru karma tvaṃ karma jyāyo hy akarmaṇaḥ Bhg_03.008a
GE07bhgce__u:265: śarīrayātrāpi ca te na prasidhyed akarmaṇaḥ Bhg_03.008c [=MBh_06,025.008c]
GE07bhgce__u:267: tadarthaṃ karma kaunteya muktasaṅgaḥ samācara Bhg_03.009c
GE07bhgce__u:268: sahayajñāḥ prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā purovāca prajāpatiḥ Bhg_03.010a
GE07bhgce__u:269: anena prasaviṣyadhvam eṣa vo 'stv iṣṭakāmadhuk Bhg_03.010c
GE07bhgce__u:270: devān bhāvayatānena te devā bhāvayantu vaḥ Bhg_03.011a [=MBh_06,025.011a]
GE07bhgce__u:271: parasparaṃ bhāvayantaḥ śreyaḥ param avāpsyatha Bhg_03.011c
GE07bhgce__u:272: iṣṭān bhogān hi vo devā dāsyante yajñabhāvitāḥ Bhg_03.012a
GE07bhgce__u:273: tair dattān apradāyaibhyo yo bhuṅkte stena eva saḥ Bhg_03.012c
GE07bhgce__u:275: bhuñjate te tv aghaṃ pāpā ye pacanty ātmakāraṇāt Bhg_03.013c
GE07bhgce__u:276: annād bhavanti bhūtāni parjanyād annasaṃbhavaḥ Bhg_03.014a
GE07bhgce__u:277: yajñād bhavati parjanyo yajñaḥ karmasamudbhavaḥ Bhg_03.014c
GE07bhgce__u:279: tasmāt sarvagataṃ brahma nityaṃ yajñe pratiṣṭhitam Bhg_03.015c
GE07bhgce__u:280: evaṃ pravartitaṃ cakraṃ nānuvartayatīha yaḥ Bhg_03.016a [=MBh_06,025.016a]
GE07bhgce__u:281: aghāyur indriyārāmo moghaṃ pārtha sa jīvati Bhg_03.016c [=MBh_06,025.016c]
GE07bhgce__u:282: yas tv ātmaratir eva syād ātmatṛptaś ca mānavaḥ Bhg_03.017a
GE07bhgce__u:283: ātmany eva ca saṃtuṣṭas tasya kāryaṃ na vidyate Bhg_03.017c
GE07bhgce__u:284: naiva tasya kṛtenārtho nākṛteneha kaś cana Bhg_03.018a [=MBh_06,025.018a]
GE07bhgce__u:285: na cāsya sarvabhūteṣu kaś cid arthavyapāśrayaḥ Bhg_03.018c
GE07bhgce__u:286: tasmād asaktaḥ satataṃ kāryaṃ karma samācara Bhg_03.019a
GE07bhgce__u:287: asakto hy ācaran karma param āpnoti pūruṣaḥ Bhg_03.019c [=MBh_06,025.019c]
GE07bhgce__u:288: karmaṇaiva hi saṃsiddhim āsthitā janakādayaḥ Bhg_03.020a
GE07bhgce__u:289: lokasaṃgraham evāpi saṃpaśyan kartum arhasi Bhg_03.020c [=MBh_06,025.020c]
GE07bhgce__u:290: yad yad ācarati śreṣṭhas tat tad evetaro janaḥ Bhg_03.021a
GE07bhgce__u:291: sa yat pramāṇaṃ kurute lokas tad anuvartate Bhg_03.021c [=MBh_06,025.021c]
GE07bhgce__u:292: na me pārthāsti kartavyaṃ triṣu lokeṣu kiṃ cana Bhg_03.022a
GE07bhgce__u:293: nānavāptam avāptavyaṃ varta eva ca karmaṇi Bhg_03.022c [=MBh_06,025.022c]
GE07bhgce__u:294: yadi hy ahaṃ na varteyaṃ jātu karmaṇy atandritaḥ Bhg_03.023a
GE07bhgce__u:295: mama vartmānuvartante manuṣyāḥ pārtha sarvaśaḥ Bhg_03.023c
GE07bhgce__u:296: utsīdeyur ime lokā na kuryāṃ karma ced aham Bhg_03.024a [=MBh_06,025.024a]
GE07bhgce__u:297: saṃkarasya ca kartā syām upahanyām imāḥ prajāḥ Bhg_03.024c
GE07bhgce__u:298: saktāḥ karmaṇy avidvāṃso yathā kurvanti bhārata Bhg_03.025a
GE07bhgce__u:299: kuryād vidvāṃs tathāsaktaś cikīrṣur lokasaṃgraham Bhg_03.025c
GE07bhgce__u:300: na buddhibhedaṃ janayed ajñānāṃ karmasaṅginām Bhg_03.026a
GE07bhgce__u:301: joṣayet sarvakarmāṇi vidvān yuktaḥ samācaran Bhg_03.026c
GE07bhgce__u:302: prakṛteḥ kriyamāṇāni guṇaiḥ karmāṇi sarvaśaḥ Bhg_03.027a
GE07bhgce__u:305: guṇā guṇeṣu vartanta iti matvā na sajjate Bhg_03.028c [=MBh_06,025.028c]
GE07bhgce__u:307: tān akṛtsnavido mandān kṛtsnavin na vicālayet Bhg_03.029c
GE07bhgce__u:309: nirāśīr nirmamo bhūtvā yudhyasva vigatajvaraḥ Bhg_03.030c
GE07bhgce__u:310: ye me matam idaṃ nityam anutiṣṭhanti mānavāḥ Bhg_03.031a
GE07bhgce__u:312: ye tv etad abhyasūyanto nānutiṣṭhanti me matam Bhg_03.032a
GE07bhgce__u:313: sarvajñānavimūḍhāṃs tān viddhi naṣṭān acetasaḥ Bhg_03.032c
GE07bhgce__u:314: sadṛśaṃ ceṣṭate svasyāḥ prakṛter jñānavān api Bhg_03.033a
GE07bhgce__u:315: prakṛtiṃ yānti bhūtāni nigrahaḥ kiṃ kariṣyati Bhg_03.033c
GE07bhgce__u:317: tayor na vaśam āgacchet tau hy asya paripanthinau Bhg_03.034c
GE07bhgce__u:318: śreyān svadharmo viguṇaḥ paradharmāt svanuṣṭhitāt Bhg_03.035a
GE07bhgce__u:319: svadharme nidhanaṃ śreyaḥ paradharmo bhayāvahaḥ Bhg_03.035c
GE07bhgce__u:321: atha kena prayukto 'yaṃ pāpaṃ carati pūruṣaḥ Bhg_03.036a
GE07bhgce__u:322: anicchann api vārṣṇeya balād iva niyojitaḥ Bhg_03.036c [=MBh_06,025.036c]
GE07bhgce__u:324: kāma eṣa krodha eṣa rajoguṇasamudbhavaḥ Bhg_03.037a [=MBh_06,025.037a]
GE07bhgce__u:325: mahāśano mahāpāpmā viddhy enam iha vairiṇam Bhg_03.037c [=MBh_06,025.037c]
GE07bhgce__u:326: dhūmenāvriyate vahnir yathādarśo malena ca Bhg_03.038a [=MBh_06,025.038a]
GE07bhgce__u:327: yatholbenāvṛto garbhas tathā tenedam āvṛtam Bhg_03.038c [=MBh_06,025.038c]
GE07bhgce__u:328: āvṛtaṃ jñānam etena jñānino nityavairiṇā Bhg_03.039a [=MBh_06,025.039a]
GE07bhgce__u:330: indriyāṇi mano buddhir asyādhiṣṭhānam ucyate Bhg_03.040a
GE07bhgce__u:331: etair vimohayaty eṣa jñānam āvṛtya dehinam Bhg_03.040c [=MBh_06,025.040c]
GE07bhgce__u:332: tasmāt tvam indriyāṇy ādau niyamya bharatarṣabha Bhg_03.041a
GE07bhgce__u:334: indriyāṇi parāṇy āhur indriyebhyaḥ paraṃ manaḥ Bhg_03.042a
GE07bhgce__u:335: manasas tu parā buddhir yo buddheḥ paratas tu saḥ Bhg_03.042c
GE07bhgce__u:336: evaṃ buddheḥ paraṃ buddhvā saṃstabhyātmānam ātmanā Bhg_03.043a
GE07bhgce__u:337: jahi śatruṃ mahābāho kāmarūpaṃ durāsadam Bhg_03.043c [=MBh_06,025.043c]
GE07bhgce__u:339: imaṃ vivasvate yogaṃ proktavān aham avyayam Bhg_04.001a [=MBh_06,026.001a]
GE07bhgce__u:340: vivasvān manave prāha manur ikṣvākave 'bravīt Bhg_04.001c
GE07bhgce__u:341: evaṃ paraṃparāprāptam imaṃ rājarṣayo viduḥ Bhg_04.002a [=MBh_06,026.002a]
GE07bhgce__u:342: sa kāleneha mahatā yogo naṣṭaḥ paraṃtapa Bhg_04.002c [=MBh_06,026.002c]
GE07bhgce__u:343: sa evāyaṃ mayā te 'dya yogaḥ proktaḥ purātanaḥ Bhg_04.003a
GE07bhgce__u:344: bhakto 'si me sakhā ceti rahasyaṃ hy etad uttamam Bhg_04.003c
GE07bhgce__u:346: aparaṃ bhavato janma paraṃ janma vivasvataḥ Bhg_04.004a [=MBh_06,026.004a]
GE07bhgce__u:347: katham etad vijānīyāṃ tvam ādau proktavān iti Bhg_04.004c
GE07bhgce__u:349: bahūni me vyatītāni janmāni tava cārjuna Bhg_04.005a [=MBh_06,026.005a]
GE07bhgce__u:350: tāny ahaṃ veda sarvāṇi na tvaṃ vettha paraṃtapa Bhg_04.005c
GE07bhgce__u:351: ajo 'pi sann avyayātmā bhūtānām īśvaro 'pi san Bhg_04.006a
GE07bhgce__u:352: prakṛtiṃ svām adhiṣṭhāya saṃbhavāmy ātmamāyayā Bhg_04.006c
GE07bhgce__u:353: yadā yadā hi dharmasya glānir bhavati bhārata Bhg_04.007a
GE07bhgce__u:354: abhyutthānam adharmasya tadātmānaṃ sṛjāmy aham Bhg_04.007c
GE07bhgce__u:355: paritrāṇāya sādhūnāṃ vināśāya ca duṣkṛtām Bhg_04.008a [=MBh_06,026.008a]
GE07bhgce__u:357: janma karma ca me divyam evaṃ yo vetti tattvataḥ Bhg_04.009a
GE07bhgce__u:358: tyaktvā dehaṃ punarjanma naiti mām eti so 'rjuna Bhg_04.009c
GE07bhgce__u:360: bahavo jñānatapasā pūtā madbhāvam āgatāḥ Bhg_04.010c [=MBh_06,026.010c]
GE07bhgce__u:361: ye yathā māṃ prapadyante tāṃs tathaiva bhajāmy aham Bhg_04.011a
GE07bhgce__u:362: mama vartmānuvartante manuṣyāḥ pārtha sarvaśaḥ Bhg_04.011c
GE07bhgce__u:363: kāṅkṣantaḥ karmaṇāṃ siddhiṃ yajanta iha devatāḥ Bhg_04.012a
GE07bhgce__u:364: kṣipraṃ hi mānuṣe loke siddhir bhavati karmajā Bhg_04.012c
GE07bhgce__u:366: tasya kartāram api māṃ viddhy akartāram avyayam Bhg_04.013c
GE07bhgce__u:367: na māṃ karmāṇi limpanti na me karmaphale spṛhā Bhg_04.014a
GE07bhgce__u:368: iti māṃ yo 'bhijānāti karmabhir na sa badhyate Bhg_04.014c
GE07bhgce__u:369: evaṃ jñātvā kṛtaṃ karma pūrvair api mumukṣubhiḥ Bhg_04.015a
GE07bhgce__u:370: kuru karmaiva tasmāt tvaṃ pūrvaiḥ pūrvataraṃ kṛtam Bhg_04.015c
GE07bhgce__u:371: kiṃ karma kim akarmeti kavayo 'py atra mohitāḥ Bhg_04.016a
GE07bhgce__u:372: tat te karma pravakṣyāmi yaj jñātvā mokṣyase 'śubhāt Bhg_04.016c
GE07bhgce__u:373: karmaṇo hy api boddhavyaṃ boddhavyaṃ ca vikarmaṇaḥ Bhg_04.017a
GE07bhgce__u:374: akarmaṇaś ca boddhavyaṃ gahanā karmaṇo gatiḥ Bhg_04.017c
GE07bhgce__u:375: karmaṇy akarma yaḥ paśyed akarmaṇi ca karma yaḥ Bhg_04.018a
GE07bhgce__u:376: sa buddhimān manuṣyeṣu sa yuktaḥ kṛtsnakarmakṛt Bhg_04.018c
GE07bhgce__u:378: jñānāgnidagdhakarmāṇaṃ tam āhuḥ paṇḍitaṃ budhāḥ Bhg_04.019c
GE07bhgce__u:380: karmaṇy abhipravṛtto 'pi naiva kiṃ cit karoti saḥ Bhg_04.020c
GE07bhgce__u:382: śārīraṃ kevalaṃ karma kurvan nāpnoti kilbiṣam Bhg_04.021c
GE07bhgce__u:384: samaḥ siddhāv asiddhau ca kṛtvāpi na nibadhyate Bhg_04.022c
GE07bhgce__u:387: brahmārpaṇaṃ brahmahavir brahmāgnau brahmaṇā hutam Bhg_04.024a
GE07bhgce__u:389: daivam evāpare yajñaṃ yoginaḥ paryupāsate Bhg_04.025a [=MBh_06,026.025a]
GE07bhgce__u:392: śabdādīn viṣayān anya indriyāgniṣu juhvati Bhg_04.026c [=MBh_06,026.026c]
GE07bhgce__u:397: apāne juhvati prāṇaṃ prāṇe 'pānaṃ tathāpare Bhg_04.029a [=MBh_06,026.029a]
GE07bhgce__u:399: apare niyatāhārāḥ prāṇān prāṇeṣu juhvati Bhg_04.030a [=MBh_06,026.030a]
GE07bhgce__u:402: nāyaṃ loko 'sty ayajñasya kuto 'nyaḥ kurusattama Bhg_04.031c
GE07bhgce__u:403: evaṃ bahuvidhā yajñā vitatā brahmaṇo mukhe Bhg_04.032a [=MBh_06,026.032a]
GE07bhgce__u:404: karmajān viddhi tān sarvān evaṃ jñātvā vimokṣyase Bhg_04.032c
GE07bhgce__u:405: śreyān dravyamayād yajñāj jñānayajñaḥ paraṃtapa Bhg_04.033a
GE07bhgce__u:406: sarvaṃ karmākhilaṃ pārtha jñāne parisamāpyate Bhg_04.033c
GE07bhgce__u:407: tad viddhi praṇipātena paripraśnena sevayā Bhg_04.034a [=MBh_06,026.034a]
GE07bhgce__u:408: upadekṣyanti te jñānaṃ jñāninas tattvadarśinaḥ Bhg_04.034c
GE07bhgce__u:409: yaj jñātvā na punar moham evaṃ yāsyasi pāṇḍava Bhg_04.035a
GE07bhgce__u:410: yena bhūtāny aśeṣeṇa drakṣyasy ātmany atho mayi Bhg_04.035c
GE07bhgce__u:411: api ced asi pāpebhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pāpakṛttamaḥ Bhg_04.036a
GE07bhgce__u:414: jñānāgniḥ sarvakarmāṇi bhasmasāt kurute tathā Bhg_04.037c
GE07bhgce__u:415: na hi jñānena sadṛśaṃ pavitram iha vidyate Bhg_04.038a [=MBh_06,026.038a]
GE07bhgce__u:416: tat svayaṃ yogasaṃsiddhaḥ kālenātmani vindati Bhg_04.038c
GE07bhgce__u:417: śraddhāvāṃl labhate jñānaṃ tatparaḥ saṃyatendriyaḥ Bhg_04.039a
GE07bhgce__u:418: jñānaṃ labdhvā parāṃ śāntim acireṇādhigacchati Bhg_04.039c
GE07bhgce__u:419: ajñaś cāśraddadhānaś ca saṃśayātmā vinaśyati Bhg_04.040a
GE07bhgce__u:420: nāyaṃ loko 'sti na paro na sukhaṃ saṃśayātmanaḥ Bhg_04.040c
GE07bhgce__u:422: ātmavantaṃ na karmāṇi nibadhnanti dhanaṃjaya Bhg_04.041c
GE07bhgce__u:424: chittvainaṃ saṃśayaṃ yogam ātiṣṭhottiṣṭha bhārata Bhg_04.042c
GE07bhgce__u:426: saṃnyāsaṃ karmaṇāṃ kṛṣṇa punar yogaṃ ca śaṃsasi Bhg_05.001a
GE07bhgce__u:427: yac chreya etayor ekaṃ tan me brūhi suniścitam Bhg_05.001c
GE07bhgce__u:429: saṃnyāsaḥ karmayogaś ca niḥśreyasakarāv ubhau Bhg_05.002a
GE07bhgce__u:430: tayos tu karmasaṃnyāsāt karmayogo viśiṣyate Bhg_05.002c [=MBh_06,027.002c]
GE07bhgce__u:431: jñeyaḥ sa nityasaṃnyāsī yo na dveṣṭi na kāṅkṣati Bhg_05.003a
GE07bhgce__u:432: nirdvaṃdvo hi mahābāho sukhaṃ bandhāt pramucyate Bhg_05.003c
GE07bhgce__u:433: sāṃkhyayogau pṛthag bālāḥ pravadanti na paṇḍitāḥ Bhg_05.004a
GE07bhgce__u:434: ekam apy āsthitaḥ samyag ubhayor vindate phalam Bhg_05.004c
GE07bhgce__u:435: yat sāṃkhyaiḥ prāpyate sthānaṃ tad yogair api gamyate Bhg_05.005a
GE07bhgce__u:436: ekaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati Bhg_05.005c
GE07bhgce__u:437: saṃnyāsas tu mahābāho duḥkham āptum ayogataḥ Bhg_05.006a
GE07bhgce__u:440: sarvabhūtātmabhūtātmā kurvann api na lipyate Bhg_05.007c
GE07bhgce__u:441: naiva kiṃ cit karomīti yukto manyeta tattvavit Bhg_05.008a
GE07bhgce__u:442: paśyañ śṛṇvan spṛśañ jighrann aśnan gacchan svapañ śvasan Bhg_05.008c
GE07bhgce__u:443: pralapan visṛjan gṛhṇann unmiṣan nimiṣann api Bhg_05.009a
GE07bhgce__u:445: brahmaṇy ādhāya karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā karoti yaḥ Bhg_05.010a
GE07bhgce__u:446: lipyate na sa pāpena padmapatram ivāmbhasā Bhg_05.010c [=MBh_06,027.010c]
GE07bhgce__u:447: kāyena manasā buddhyā kevalair indriyair api Bhg_05.011a
GE07bhgce__u:448: yoginaḥ karma kurvanti saṅgaṃ tyaktvātmaśuddhaye Bhg_05.011c
GE07bhgce__u:449: yuktaḥ karmaphalaṃ tyaktvā śāntim āpnoti naiṣṭhikīm Bhg_05.012a
GE07bhgce__u:450: ayuktaḥ kāmakāreṇa phale sakto nibadhyate Bhg_05.012c [=MBh_06,027.012c]
GE07bhgce__u:451: sarvakarmāṇi manasā saṃnyasyāste sukhaṃ vaśī Bhg_05.013a
GE07bhgce__u:452: navadvāre pure dehī naiva kurvan na kārayan Bhg_05.013c [=MBh_06,027.013c]
GE07bhgce__u:453: na kartṛtvaṃ na karmāṇi lokasya sṛjati prabhuḥ Bhg_05.014a
GE07bhgce__u:454: na karmaphalasaṃyogaṃ svabhāvas tu pravartate Bhg_05.014c
GE07bhgce__u:455: nādatte kasya cit pāpaṃ na caiva sukṛtaṃ vibhuḥ Bhg_05.015a
GE07bhgce__u:456: ajñānenāvṛtaṃ jñānaṃ tena muhyanti jantavaḥ Bhg_05.015c [=MBh_06,027.015c]
GE07bhgce__u:457: jñānena tu tad ajñānaṃ yeṣāṃ nāśitam ātmanaḥ Bhg_05.016a
GE07bhgce__u:458: teṣām ādityavaj jñānaṃ prakāśayati tatparam Bhg_05.016c [=MBh_06,027.016c]
GE07bhgce__u:462: śuni caiva śvapāke ca paṇḍitāḥ samadarśinaḥ Bhg_05.018c [=MBh_06,027.018c]
GE07bhgce__u:463: ihaiva tair jitaḥ sargo yeṣāṃ sāmye sthitaṃ manaḥ Bhg_05.019a
GE07bhgce__u:464: nirdoṣaṃ hi samaṃ brahma tasmād brahmaṇi te sthitāḥ Bhg_05.019c
GE07bhgce__u:465: na prahṛṣyet priyaṃ prāpya nodvijet prāpya cāpriyam Bhg_05.020a
GE07bhgce__u:466: sthirabuddhir asaṃmūḍho brahmavid brahmaṇi sthitaḥ Bhg_05.020c
GE07bhgce__u:467: bāhyasparśeṣv asaktātmā vindaty ātmani yat sukham Bhg_05.021a
GE07bhgce__u:468: sa brahmayogayuktātmā sukham akṣayam aśnute Bhg_05.021c [=MBh_06,027.021c]
GE07bhgce__u:469: ye hi saṃsparśajā bhogā duḥkhayonaya eva te Bhg_05.022a [=MBh_06,027.022a]
GE07bhgce__u:470: ādyantavantaḥ kaunteya na teṣu ramate budhaḥ Bhg_05.022c
GE07bhgce__u:471: śaknotīhaiva yaḥ soḍhuṃ prāk śarīravimokṣaṇāt Bhg_05.023a
GE07bhgce__u:472: kāmakrodhodbhavaṃ vegaṃ sa yuktaḥ sa sukhī naraḥ Bhg_05.023c
GE07bhgce__u:479: sparśān kṛtvā bahir bāhyāṃś cakṣuś caivāntare bhruvoḥ Bhg_05.027a
GE07bhgce__u:482: vigatecchābhayakrodho yaḥ sadā mukta eva saḥ Bhg_05.028c
GE07bhgce__u:484: suhṛdaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ jñātvā māṃ śāntim ṛcchati Bhg_05.029c
GE07bhgce__u:486: anāśritaḥ karmaphalaṃ kāryaṃ karma karoti yaḥ Bhg_06.001a
GE07bhgce__u:487: sa saṃnyāsī ca yogī ca na niragnir na cākriyaḥ Bhg_06.001c
GE07bhgce__u:488: yaṃ saṃnyāsam iti prāhur yogaṃ taṃ viddhi pāṇḍava Bhg_06.002a
GE07bhgce__u:489: na hy asaṃnyastasaṃkalpo yogī bhavati kaś cana Bhg_06.002c
GE07bhgce__u:490: ārurukṣor muner yogaṃ karma kāraṇam ucyate Bhg_06.003a [=MBh_06,028.003a]
GE07bhgce__u:491: yogārūḍhasya tasyaiva śamaḥ kāraṇam ucyate Bhg_06.003c [=MBh_06,028.003c]
GE07bhgce__u:492: yadā hi nendriyārtheṣu na karmasv anuṣajjate Bhg_06.004a
GE07bhgce__u:495: ātmaiva hy ātmano bandhur ātmaiva ripur ātmanaḥ Bhg_06.005c
GE07bhgce__u:496: bandhur ātmātmanas tasya yenātmaivātmanā jitaḥ Bhg_06.006a
GE07bhgce__u:497: anātmanas tu śatrutve vartetātmaiva śatruvat Bhg_06.006c
GE07bhgce__u:501: yukta ity ucyate yogī samaloṣṭāśmakāñcanaḥ Bhg_06.008c [=MBh_06,028.008c]
GE07bhgce__u:503: sādhuṣv api ca pāpeṣu samabuddhir viśiṣyate Bhg_06.009c [=MBh_06,028.009c]
GE07bhgce__u:504: yogī yuñjīta satatam ātmānaṃ rahasi sthitaḥ Bhg_06.010a [=MBh_06,028.010a]
GE07bhgce__u:506: śucau deśe pratiṣṭhāpya sthiram āsanam ātmanaḥ Bhg_06.011a
GE07bhgce__u:510: samaṃ kāyaśirogrīvaṃ dhārayann acalaṃ sthiraḥ Bhg_06.013a
GE07bhgce__u:511: saṃprekṣya nāsikāgraṃ svaṃ diśaś cānavalokayan Bhg_06.013c
GE07bhgce__u:513: manaḥ saṃyamya maccitto yukta āsīta matparaḥ Bhg_06.014c
GE07bhgce__u:514: yuñjann evaṃ sadātmānaṃ yogī niyatamānasaḥ Bhg_06.015a [=MBh_06,028.015a]
GE07bhgce__u:516: nātyaśnatas tu yogo 'sti na caikāntam anaśnataḥ Bhg_06.016a
GE07bhgce__u:517: na cātisvapnaśīlasya jāgrato naiva cārjuna Bhg_06.016c [=MBh_06,028.016c]
GE07bhgce__u:520: yadā viniyataṃ cittam ātmany evāvatiṣṭhate Bhg_06.018a [=MBh_06,028.018a]
GE07bhgce__u:521: niḥspṛhaḥ sarvakāmebhyo yukta ity ucyate tadā Bhg_06.018c
GE07bhgce__u:522: yathā dīpo nivātastho neṅgate sopamā smṛtā Bhg_06.019a [=MBh_06,028.019a]
GE07bhgce__u:523: yogino yatacittasya yuñjato yogam ātmanaḥ Bhg_06.019c [=MBh_06,028.019c]
GE07bhgce__u:525: yatra caivātmanātmānaṃ paśyann ātmani tuṣyati Bhg_06.020c
GE07bhgce__u:526: sukham ātyantikaṃ yat tad buddhigrāhyam atīndriyam Bhg_06.021a
GE07bhgce__u:527: vetti yatra na caivāyaṃ sthitaś calati tattvataḥ Bhg_06.021c
GE07bhgce__u:528: yaṃ labdhvā cāparaṃ lābhaṃ manyate nādhikaṃ tataḥ Bhg_06.022a
GE07bhgce__u:529: yasmin sthito na duḥkhena guruṇāpi vicālyate Bhg_06.022c
GE07bhgce__u:532: saṃkalpaprabhavān kāmāṃs tyaktvā sarvān aśeṣataḥ Bhg_06.024a
GE07bhgce__u:534: śanaiḥ śanair uparamed buddhyā dhṛtigṛhītayā Bhg_06.025a
GE07bhgce__u:535: ātmasaṃsthaṃ manaḥ kṛtvā na kiṃ cid api cintayet Bhg_06.025c
GE07bhgce__u:536: yato yato niścarati manaś cañcalam asthiram Bhg_06.026a [=MBh_06,028.026a]
GE07bhgce__u:537: tatas tato niyamyaitad ātmany eva vaśaṃ nayet Bhg_06.026c
GE07bhgce__u:538: praśāntamanasaṃ hy enaṃ yoginaṃ sukham uttamam Bhg_06.027a
GE07bhgce__u:540: yuñjann evaṃ sadātmānaṃ yogī vigatakalmaṣaḥ Bhg_06.028a [=MBh_06,028.028a]
GE07bhgce__u:541: sukhena brahmasaṃsparśam atyantaṃ sukham aśnute Bhg_06.028c
GE07bhgce__u:544: yo māṃ paśyati sarvatra sarvaṃ ca mayi paśyati Bhg_06.030a
GE07bhgce__u:545: tasyāhaṃ na praṇaśyāmi sa ca me na praṇaśyati Bhg_06.030c
GE07bhgce__u:546: sarvabhūtasthitaṃ yo māṃ bhajaty ekatvam āsthitaḥ Bhg_06.031a
GE07bhgce__u:547: sarvathā vartamāno 'pi sa yogī mayi vartate Bhg_06.031c [=MBh_06,028.031c]
GE07bhgce__u:548: ātmaupamyena sarvatra samaṃ paśyati yo 'rjuna Bhg_06.032a
GE07bhgce__u:549: sukhaṃ vā yadi vā duḥkhaṃ sa yogī paramo mataḥ Bhg_06.032c
GE07bhgce__u:551: yo 'yaṃ yogas tvayā proktaḥ sāmyena madhusūdana Bhg_06.033a
GE07bhgce__u:552: etasyāhaṃ na paśyāmi cañcalatvāt sthitiṃ sthirām Bhg_06.033c
GE07bhgce__u:553: cañcalaṃ hi manaḥ kṛṣṇa pramāthi balavad dṛḍham Bhg_06.034a
GE07bhgce__u:554: tasyāhaṃ nigrahaṃ manye vāyor iva suduṣkaram Bhg_06.034c
GE07bhgce__u:556: asaṃśayaṃ mahābāho mano durnigrahaṃ calam Bhg_06.035a [=MBh_06,028.035a]
GE07bhgce__u:557: abhyāsena tu kaunteya vairāgyeṇa ca gṛhyate Bhg_06.035c [=MBh_06,028.035c]
GE07bhgce__u:558: asaṃyatātmanā yogo duṣprāpa iti me matiḥ Bhg_06.036a [=MBh_06,028.036a]
GE07bhgce__u:559: vaśyātmanā tu yatatā śakyo 'vāptum upāyataḥ Bhg_06.036c [=MBh_06,028.036c]
GE07bhgce__u:562: aprāpya yogasaṃsiddhiṃ kāṃ gatiṃ kṛṣṇa gacchati Bhg_06.037c
GE07bhgce__u:563: kaccin nobhayavibhraṣṭaś chinnābhram iva naśyati Bhg_06.038a
GE07bhgce__u:564: apratiṣṭho mahābāho vimūḍho brahmaṇaḥ pathi Bhg_06.038c [=MBh_06,028.038c]
GE07bhgce__u:565: etan me saṃśayaṃ kṛṣṇa chettum arhasy aśeṣataḥ Bhg_06.039a
GE07bhgce__u:566: tvad anyaḥ saṃśayasyāsya chettā na hy upapadyate Bhg_06.039c
GE07bhgce__u:568: pārtha naiveha nāmutra vināśas tasya vidyate Bhg_06.040a
GE07bhgce__u:569: na hi kalyāṇakṛt kaś cid durgatiṃ tāta gacchati Bhg_06.040c
GE07bhgce__u:570: prāpya puṇyakṛtāṃl lokān uṣitvā śāśvatīḥ samāḥ Bhg_06.041a
GE07bhgce__u:572: atha vā yoginām eva kule bhavati dhīmatām Bhg_06.042a [=MBh_06,028.042a]
GE07bhgce__u:573: etad dhi durlabhataraṃ loke janma yad īdṛśam Bhg_06.042c
GE07bhgce__u:574: tatra taṃ buddhisaṃyogaṃ labhate paurvadehikam Bhg_06.043a
GE07bhgce__u:575: yatate ca tato bhūyaḥ saṃsiddhau kurunandana Bhg_06.043c
GE07bhgce__u:576: pūrvābhyāsena tenaiva hriyate hy avaśo 'pi saḥ Bhg_06.044a
GE07bhgce__u:578: prayatnād yatamānas tu yogī saṃśuddhakilbiṣaḥ Bhg_06.045a
GE07bhgce__u:579: anekajanmasaṃsiddhas tato yāti parāṃ gatim Bhg_06.045c [=MBh_06,028.045c]
GE07bhgce__u:581: karmibhyaś cādhiko yogī tasmād yogī bhavārjuna Bhg_06.046c
GE07bhgce__u:583: śraddhāvān bhajate yo māṃ sa me yuktatamo mataḥ Bhg_06.047c
GE07bhgce__u:585: mayy āsaktamanāḥ pārtha yogaṃ yuñjan madāśrayaḥ Bhg_07.001a
GE07bhgce__u:586: asaṃśayaṃ samagraṃ māṃ yathā jñāsyasi tac chṛṇu Bhg_07.001c
GE07bhgce__u:587: jñānaṃ te 'haṃ savijñānam idaṃ vakṣyāmy aśeṣataḥ Bhg_07.002a
GE07bhgce__u:588: yaj jñātvā neha bhūyo 'nyaj jñātavyam avaśiṣyate Bhg_07.002c
GE07bhgce__u:589: manuṣyāṇāṃ sahasreṣu kaś cid yatati siddhaye Bhg_07.003a
GE07bhgce__u:590: yatatām api siddhānāṃ kaś cin māṃ vetti tattvataḥ Bhg_07.003c
GE07bhgce__u:591: bhūmir āpo 'nalo vāyuḥ khaṃ mano buddhir eva ca Bhg_07.004a
GE07bhgce__u:592: ahaṃkāra itīyaṃ me bhinnā prakṛtir aṣṭadhā Bhg_07.004c [=MBh_06,029.004c]
GE07bhgce__u:593: apareyam itas tv anyāṃ prakṛtiṃ viddhi me parām Bhg_07.005a
GE07bhgce__u:594: jīvabhūtāṃ mahābāho yayedaṃ dhāryate jagat Bhg_07.005c [=MBh_06,029.005c]
GE07bhgce__u:596: ahaṃ kṛtsnasya jagataḥ prabhavaḥ pralayas tathā Bhg_07.006c
GE07bhgce__u:597: mattaḥ parataraṃ nānyat kiṃ cid asti dhanaṃjaya Bhg_07.007a
GE07bhgce__u:598: mayi sarvam idaṃ protaṃ sūtre maṇigaṇā iva Bhg_07.007c [=MBh_06,029.007c]
GE07bhgce__u:599: raso 'ham apsu kaunteya prabhāsmi śaśisūryayoḥ Bhg_07.008a
GE07bhgce__u:600: praṇavaḥ sarvavedeṣu śabdaḥ khe pauruṣaṃ nṛṣu Bhg_07.008c
GE07bhgce__u:601: puṇyo gandhaḥ pṛthivyāṃ ca tejaś cāsmi vibhāvasau Bhg_07.009a
GE07bhgce__u:602: jīvanaṃ sarvabhūteṣu tapaś cāsmi tapasviṣu Bhg_07.009c [=MBh_06,029.009c]
GE07bhgce__u:603: bījaṃ māṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ viddhi pārtha sanātanam Bhg_07.010a
GE07bhgce__u:604: buddhir buddhimatām asmi tejas tejasvinām aham Bhg_07.010c
GE07bhgce__u:607: ye caiva sāttvikā bhāvā rājasās tāmasāś ca ye Bhg_07.012a
GE07bhgce__u:608: matta eveti tān viddhi na tv ahaṃ teṣu te mayi Bhg_07.012c
GE07bhgce__u:609: tribhir guṇamayair bhāvair ebhiḥ sarvam idaṃ jagat Bhg_07.013a
GE07bhgce__u:610: mohitaṃ nābhijānāti mām ebhyaḥ param avyayam Bhg_07.013c
GE07bhgce__u:611: daivī hy eṣā guṇamayī mama māyā duratyayā Bhg_07.014a [=MBh_06,029.014a]
GE07bhgce__u:612: mām eva ye prapadyante māyām etāṃ taranti te Bhg_07.014c
GE07bhgce__u:613: na māṃ duṣkṛtino mūḍhāḥ prapadyante narādhamāḥ Bhg_07.015a
GE07bhgce__u:615: caturvidhā bhajante māṃ janāḥ sukṛtino 'rjuna Bhg_07.016a
GE07bhgce__u:616: ārto jijñāsur arthārthī jñānī ca bharatarṣabha Bhg_07.016c
GE07bhgce__u:617: teṣāṃ jñānī nityayukta ekabhaktir viśiṣyate Bhg_07.017a [=MBh_06,029.017a]
GE07bhgce__u:618: priyo hi jñānino 'tyartham ahaṃ sa ca mama priyaḥ Bhg_07.017c
GE07bhgce__u:619: udārāḥ sarva evaite jñānī tv ātmaiva me matam Bhg_07.018a
GE07bhgce__u:620: āsthitaḥ sa hi yuktātmā mām evānuttamāṃ gatim Bhg_07.018c
GE07bhgce__u:621: bahūnāṃ janmanām ante jñānavān māṃ prapadyate Bhg_07.019a
GE07bhgce__u:622: vāsudevaḥ sarvam iti sa mahātmā sudurlabhaḥ Bhg_07.019c [=MBh_06,029.019c]
GE07bhgce__u:623: kāmais tais tair hṛtajñānāḥ prapadyante 'nyadevatāḥ Bhg_07.020a
GE07bhgce__u:624: taṃ taṃ niyamam āsthāya prakṛtyā niyatāḥ svayā Bhg_07.020c
GE07bhgce__u:625: yo yo yāṃ yāṃ tanuṃ bhaktaḥ śraddhayārcitum icchati Bhg_07.021a
GE07bhgce__u:626: tasya tasyācalāṃ śraddhāṃ tām eva vidadhāmy aham Bhg_07.021c
GE07bhgce__u:627: sa tayā śraddhayā yuktas tasyā rādhanam īhate Bhg_07.022a
GE07bhgce__u:628: labhate ca tataḥ kāmān mayaiva vihitān hi tān Bhg_07.022c
GE07bhgce__u:629: antavat tu phalaṃ teṣāṃ tad bhavaty alpamedhasām Bhg_07.023a
GE07bhgce__u:630: devān devayajo yānti madbhaktā yānti mām api Bhg_07.023c
GE07bhgce__u:631: avyaktaṃ vyaktim āpannaṃ manyante mām abuddhayaḥ Bhg_07.024a
GE07bhgce__u:632: paraṃ bhāvam ajānanto mamāvyayam anuttamam Bhg_07.024c [=MBh_06,029.024c]
GE07bhgce__u:634: mūḍho 'yaṃ nābhijānāti loko mām ajam avyayam Bhg_07.025c
GE07bhgce__u:636: bhaviṣyāṇi ca bhūtāni māṃ tu veda na kaś cana Bhg_07.026c
GE07bhgce__u:638: sarvabhūtāni saṃmohaṃ sarge yānti paraṃtapa Bhg_07.027c [=MBh_06,029.027c]
GE07bhgce__u:639: yeṣāṃ tv antagataṃ pāpaṃ janānāṃ puṇyakarmaṇām Bhg_07.028a
GE07bhgce__u:640: te dvaṃdvamohanirmuktā bhajante māṃ dṛḍhavratāḥ Bhg_07.028c
GE07bhgce__u:641: jarāmaraṇamokṣāya mām āśritya yatanti ye Bhg_07.029a [=MBh_06,029.029a]
GE07bhgce__u:642: te brahma tad viduḥ kṛtsnam adhyātmaṃ karma cākhilam Bhg_07.029c
GE07bhgce__u:643: sādhibhūtādhidaivaṃ māṃ sādhiyajñaṃ ca ye viduḥ Bhg_07.030a
GE07bhgce__u:644: prayāṇakāle 'pi ca māṃ te vidur yuktacetasaḥ Bhg_07.030c
GE07bhgce__u:646: kiṃ tad brahma kim adhyātmaṃ kiṃ karma puruṣottama Bhg_08.001a
GE07bhgce__u:647: adhibhūtaṃ ca kiṃ proktam adhidaivaṃ kim ucyate Bhg_08.001c
GE07bhgce__u:648: adhiyajñaḥ kathaṃ ko 'tra dehe 'smin madhusūdana Bhg_08.002a
GE07bhgce__u:649: prayāṇakāle ca kathaṃ jñeyo 'si niyatātmabhiḥ Bhg_08.002c
GE07bhgce__u:651: akṣaraṃ brahma paramaṃ svabhāvo 'dhyātmam ucyate Bhg_08.003a
GE07bhgce__u:653: adhibhūtaṃ kṣaro bhāvaḥ puruṣaś cādhidaivatam Bhg_08.004a
GE07bhgce__u:654: adhiyajño 'ham evātra dehe dehabhṛtāṃ vara Bhg_08.004c [=MBh_06,030.004c]
GE07bhgce__u:655: antakāle ca mām eva smaran muktvā kalevaram Bhg_08.005a [=MBh_06,030.005a]
GE07bhgce__u:656: yaḥ prayāti sa madbhāvaṃ yāti nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ Bhg_08.005c
GE07bhgce__u:657: yaṃ yaṃ vāpi smaran bhāvaṃ tyajaty ante kalevaram Bhg_08.006a
GE07bhgce__u:658: taṃ tam evaiti kaunteya sadā tadbhāvabhāvitaḥ Bhg_08.006c
GE07bhgce__u:659: tasmāt sarveṣu kāleṣu mām anusmara yudhya ca Bhg_08.007a
GE07bhgce__u:660: mayy arpitamanobuddhir mām evaiṣyasy asaṃśayaḥ Bhg_08.007c
GE07bhgce__u:662: paramaṃ puruṣaṃ divyaṃ yāti pārthānucintayan Bhg_08.008c
GE07bhgce__u:663: kaviṃ purāṇam anuśāsitāram; aṇor aṇīyāṃsam anusmared yaḥ Bhg_08.009a
GE07bhgce__u:664: sarvasya dhātāram acintyarūpam; ādityavarṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastāt Bhg_08.009c
GE07bhgce__u:665: prayāṇakāle manasācalena; bhaktyā yukto yogabalena caiva Bhg_08.010a
GE07bhgce__u:666: bhruvor madhye prāṇam āveśya samyak; sa taṃ paraṃ puruṣam upaiti divyam
GE07bhgce__u:667: yad akṣaraṃ vedavido vadanti; viśanti yad yatayo vītarāgāḥ Bhg_08.011a
GE07bhgce__u:668: yad icchanto brahmacaryaṃ caranti; tat te padaṃ saṃgraheṇa pravakṣye Bhg_08.011c [=MBh_06,030.011c]
GE07bhgce__u:669: sarvadvārāṇi saṃyamya mano hṛdi nirudhya ca Bhg_08.012a [=MBh_06,030.012a]
GE07bhgce__u:670: mūrdhny ādhāyātmanaḥ prāṇam āsthito yogadhāraṇām Bhg_08.012c
GE07bhgce__u:671: om ity ekākṣaraṃ brahma vyāharan mām anusmaran Bhg_08.013a
GE07bhgce__u:672: yaḥ prayāti tyajan dehaṃ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim Bhg_08.013c
GE07bhgce__u:673: ananyacetāḥ satataṃ yo māṃ smarati nityaśaḥ Bhg_08.014a [=MBh_06,030.014a]
GE07bhgce__u:674: tasyāhaṃ sulabhaḥ pārtha nityayuktasya yoginaḥ Bhg_08.014c
GE07bhgce__u:675: mām upetya punarjanma duḥkhālayam aśāśvatam Bhg_08.015a [=MBh_06,030.015a]
GE07bhgce__u:676: nāpnuvanti mahātmānaḥ saṃsiddhiṃ paramāṃ gatāḥ Bhg_08.015c
GE07bhgce__u:678: mām upetya tu kaunteya punarjanma na vidyate Bhg_08.016c
GE07bhgce__u:679: sahasrayugaparyantam ahar yad brahmaṇo viduḥ Bhg_08.017a
GE07bhgce__u:681: avyaktād vyaktayaḥ sarvāḥ prabhavanty aharāgame Bhg_08.018a
GE07bhgce__u:683: bhūtagrāmaḥ sa evāyaṃ bhūtvā bhūtvā pralīyate Bhg_08.019a
GE07bhgce__u:685: paras tasmāt tu bhāvo 'nyo 'vyakto 'vyaktāt sanātanaḥ Bhg_08.020a
GE07bhgce__u:686: yaḥ sa sarveṣu bhūteṣu naśyatsu na vinaśyati Bhg_08.020c
GE07bhgce__u:687: avyakto 'kṣara ity uktas tam āhuḥ paramāṃ gatim Bhg_08.021a
GE07bhgce__u:688: yaṃ prāpya na nivartante tad dhāma paramaṃ mama Bhg_08.021c
GE07bhgce__u:689: puruṣaḥ sa paraḥ pārtha bhaktyā labhyas tv ananyayā Bhg_08.022a
GE07bhgce__u:690: yasyāntaḥsthāni bhūtāni yena sarvam idaṃ tatam Bhg_08.022c
GE07bhgce__u:691: yatra kāle tv anāvṛttim āvṛttiṃ caiva yoginaḥ Bhg_08.023a
GE07bhgce__u:692: prayātā yānti taṃ kālaṃ vakṣyāmi bharatarṣabha Bhg_08.023c
GE07bhgce__u:693: agnir jyotir ahaḥ śuklaḥ ṣaṇmāsā uttarāyaṇam Bhg_08.024a
GE07bhgce__u:694: tatra prayātā gacchanti brahma brahmavido janāḥ Bhg_08.024c
GE07bhgce__u:695: dhūmo rātris tathā kṛṣṇaḥ ṣaṇmāsā dakṣiṇāyanam Bhg_08.025a
GE07bhgce__u:696: tatra cāndramasaṃ jyotir yogī prāpya nivartate Bhg_08.025c
GE07bhgce__u:697: śuklakṛṣṇe gatī hy ete jagataḥ śāśvate mate Bhg_08.026a [=MBh_06,030.026a]
GE07bhgce__u:698: ekayā yāty anāvṛttim anyayāvartate punaḥ Bhg_08.026c [=MBh_06,030.026c]
GE07bhgce__u:699: naite sṛtī pārtha jānan yogī muhyati kaś cana Bhg_08.027a
GE07bhgce__u:700: tasmāt sarveṣu kāleṣu yogayukto bhavārjuna Bhg_08.027c [=MBh_06,030.027c]
GE07bhgce__u:701: vedeṣu yajñeṣu tapaḥsu caiva; dāneṣu yat puṇyaphalaṃ pradiṣṭam Bhg_08.028a
GE07bhgce__u:702: atyeti tat sarvam idaṃ viditvā; yogī paraṃ sthānam upaiti cādyam Bhg_08.028c [=MBh_06,030.028c]
GE07bhgce__u:704: idaṃ tu te guhyatamaṃ pravakṣyāmy anasūyave Bhg_09.001a [=MBh_06,031.001a]
GE07bhgce__u:705: jñānaṃ vijñānasahitaṃ yaj jñātvā mokṣyase 'śubhāt Bhg_09.001c
GE07bhgce__u:706: rājavidyā rājaguhyaṃ pavitram idam uttamam Bhg_09.002a [=MBh_06,031.002a]
GE07bhgce__u:707: pratyakṣāvagamaṃ dharmyaṃ susukhaṃ kartum avyayam Bhg_09.002c
GE07bhgce__u:710: mayā tatam idaṃ sarvaṃ jagad avyaktamūrtinā Bhg_09.004a [=MBh_06,031.004a]
GE07bhgce__u:711: matsthāni sarvabhūtāni na cāhaṃ teṣv avasthitaḥ Bhg_09.004c
GE07bhgce__u:712: na ca matsthāni bhūtāni paśya me yogam aiśvaram Bhg_09.005a
GE07bhgce__u:713: bhūtabhṛn na ca bhūtastho mamātmā bhūtabhāvanaḥ Bhg_09.005c
GE07bhgce__u:714: yathākāśasthito nityaṃ vāyuḥ sarvatrago mahān Bhg_09.006a
GE07bhgce__u:715: tathā sarvāṇi bhūtāni matsthānīty upadhāraya Bhg_09.006c
GE07bhgce__u:716: sarvabhūtāni kaunteya prakṛtiṃ yānti māmikām Bhg_09.007a
GE07bhgce__u:717: kalpakṣaye punas tāni kalpādau visṛjāmy aham Bhg_09.007c
GE07bhgce__u:718: prakṛtiṃ svām avaṣṭabhya visṛjāmi punaḥ punaḥ Bhg_09.008a
GE07bhgce__u:719: bhūtagrāmam imaṃ kṛtsnam avaśaṃ prakṛter vaśāt Bhg_09.008c
GE07bhgce__u:720: na ca māṃ tāni karmāṇi nibadhnanti dhanaṃjaya Bhg_09.009a
GE07bhgce__u:721: udāsīnavad āsīnam asaktaṃ teṣu karmasu Bhg_09.009c [=MBh_06,031.009c]
GE07bhgce__u:724: avajānanti māṃ mūḍhā mānuṣīṃ tanum āśritam Bhg_09.011a [=MBh_06,031.011a]
GE07bhgce__u:725: paraṃ bhāvam ajānanto mama bhūtamaheśvaram Bhg_09.011c [=MBh_06,031.011c]
GE07bhgce__u:727: rākṣasīm āsurīṃ caiva prakṛtiṃ mohinīṃ śritāḥ Bhg_09.012c
GE07bhgce__u:728: mahātmānas tu māṃ pārtha daivīṃ prakṛtim āśritāḥ Bhg_09.013a
GE07bhgce__u:729: bhajanty ananyamanaso jñātvā bhūtādim avyayam Bhg_09.013c
GE07bhgce__u:730: satataṃ kīrtayanto māṃ yatantaś ca dṛḍhavratāḥ Bhg_09.014a
GE07bhgce__u:731: namasyantaś ca māṃ bhaktyā nityayuktā upāsate Bhg_09.014c
GE07bhgce__u:732: jñānayajñena cāpy anye yajanto mām upāsate Bhg_09.015a [=MBh_06,031.015a]
GE07bhgce__u:734: ahaṃ kratur ahaṃ yajñaḥ svadhāham aham auṣadham Bhg_09.016a
GE07bhgce__u:735: mantro 'ham aham evājyam aham agnir ahaṃ hutam Bhg_09.016c
GE07bhgce__u:736: pitāham asya jagato mātā dhātā pitāmahaḥ Bhg_09.017a [=MBh_06,031.017a]
GE07bhgce__u:737: vedyaṃ pavitram oṃkāra ṛk sāma yajur eva ca Bhg_09.017c [=MBh_06,031.017c]
GE07bhgce__u:738: gatir bhartā prabhuḥ sākṣī nivāsaḥ śaraṇaṃ suhṛt Bhg_09.018a
GE07bhgce__u:739: prabhavaḥ pralayaḥ sthānaṃ nidhānaṃ bījam avyayam Bhg_09.018c
GE07bhgce__u:740: tapāmy aham ahaṃ varṣaṃ nigṛhṇāmy utsṛjāmi ca Bhg_09.019a
GE07bhgce__u:741: amṛtaṃ caiva mṛtyuś ca sad asac cāham arjuna Bhg_09.019c
GE07bhgce__u:742: traividyā māṃ somapāḥ pūtapāpā; yajñair iṣṭvā svargatiṃ prārthayante
GE07bhgce__u:743: te puṇyam āsādya surendralokam; aśnanti divyān divi devabhogān Bhg_09.020c
GE07bhgce__u:744: te taṃ bhuktvā svargalokaṃ viśālaṃ; kṣīṇe puṇye martyalokaṃ viśanti
GE07bhgce__u:745: evaṃ trayīdharmam anuprapannā; gatāgataṃ kāmakāmā labhante Bhg_09.021c
GE07bhgce__u:746: ananyāś cintayanto māṃ ye janāḥ paryupāsate Bhg_09.022a [=MBh_06,031.022a]
GE07bhgce__u:747: teṣāṃ nityābhiyuktānāṃ yogakṣemaṃ vahāmy aham Bhg_09.022c
GE07bhgce__u:748: ye 'py anyadevatā bhaktā yajante śraddhayānvitāḥ Bhg_09.023a
GE07bhgce__u:749: te 'pi mām eva kaunteya yajanty avidhipūrvakam Bhg_09.023c
GE07bhgce__u:750: ahaṃ hi sarvayajñānāṃ bhoktā ca prabhur eva ca Bhg_09.024a
GE07bhgce__u:751: na tu mām abhijānanti tattvenātaś cyavanti te Bhg_09.024c
GE07bhgce__u:752: yānti devavratā devān pitṝn yānti pitṛvratāḥ Bhg_09.025a
GE07bhgce__u:753: bhūtāni yānti bhūtejyā yānti madyājino 'pi mām Bhg_09.025c
GE07bhgce__u:754: patraṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ toyaṃ yo me bhaktyā prayacchati Bhg_09.026a
GE07bhgce__u:755: tad ahaṃ bhaktyupahṛtam aśnāmi prayatātmanaḥ Bhg_09.026c
GE07bhgce__u:756: yat karoṣi yad aśnāsi yaj juhoṣi dadāsi yat Bhg_09.027a [=MBh_06,031.027a]
GE07bhgce__u:757: yat tapasyasi kaunteya tat kuruṣva madarpaṇam Bhg_09.027c
GE07bhgce__u:760: samo 'haṃ sarvabhūteṣu na me dveṣyo 'sti na priyaḥ Bhg_09.029a
GE07bhgce__u:761: ye bhajanti tu māṃ bhaktyā mayi te teṣu cāpy aham Bhg_09.029c
GE07bhgce__u:762: api cet sudurācāro bhajate mām ananyabhāk Bhg_09.030a [=MBh_06,031.030a]
GE07bhgce__u:763: sādhur eva sa mantavyaḥ samyag vyavasito hi saḥ Bhg_09.030c
GE07bhgce__u:764: kṣipraṃ bhavati dharmātmā śaśvacchāntiṃ nigacchati Bhg_09.031a
GE07bhgce__u:765: kaunteya pratijānīhi na me bhaktaḥ praṇaśyati Bhg_09.031c
GE07bhgce__u:766: māṃ hi pārtha vyapāśritya ye 'pi syuḥ pāpayonayaḥ Bhg_09.032a
GE07bhgce__u:767: striyo vaiśyās tathā śūdrās te 'pi yānti parāṃ gatim Bhg_09.032c
GE07bhgce__u:768: kiṃ punar brāhmaṇāḥ puṇyā bhaktā rājarṣayas tathā Bhg_09.033a
GE07bhgce__u:769: anityam asukhaṃ lokam imaṃ prāpya bhajasva mām Bhg_09.033c
GE07bhgce__u:770: manmanā bhava madbhakto madyājī māṃ namaskuru Bhg_09.034a
GE07bhgce__u:771: mām evaiṣyasi yuktvaivam ātmānaṃ matparāyaṇaḥ Bhg_09.034c
GE07bhgce__u:773: bhūya eva mahābāho śṛṇu me paramaṃ vacaḥ Bhg_10.001a [=MBh_06,032.001a]
GE07bhgce__u:774: yat te 'haṃ prīyamāṇāya vakṣyāmi hitakāmyayā Bhg_10.001c
GE07bhgce__u:775: na me viduḥ suragaṇāḥ prabhavaṃ na maharṣayaḥ Bhg_10.002a
GE07bhgce__u:776: aham ādir hi devānāṃ maharṣīṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ Bhg_10.002c [=MBh_06,032.002c]
GE07bhgce__u:777: yo mām ajam anādiṃ ca vetti lokamaheśvaram Bhg_10.003a [=MBh_06,032.003a]
GE07bhgce__u:778: asaṃmūḍhaḥ sa martyeṣu sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate Bhg_10.003c
GE07bhgce__u:779: buddhir jñānam asaṃmohaḥ kṣamā satyaṃ damaḥ śamaḥ Bhg_10.004a
GE07bhgce__u:780: sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhavo 'bhāvo bhayaṃ cābhayam eva ca Bhg_10.004c
GE07bhgce__u:781: ahiṃsā samatā tuṣṭis tapo dānaṃ yaśo 'yaśaḥ Bhg_10.005a [=MBh_06,032.005a]
GE07bhgce__u:782: bhavanti bhāvā bhūtānāṃ matta eva pṛthagvidhāḥ Bhg_10.005c
GE07bhgce__u:783: maharṣayaḥ sapta pūrve catvāro manavas tathā Bhg_10.006a
GE07bhgce__u:784: madbhāvā mānasā jātā yeṣāṃ loka imāḥ prajāḥ Bhg_10.006c [=MBh_06,032.006c]
GE07bhgce__u:785: etāṃ vibhūtiṃ yogaṃ ca mama yo vetti tattvataḥ Bhg_10.007a
GE07bhgce__u:786: so 'vikampena yogena yujyate nātra saṃśayaḥ Bhg_10.007c [=MBh_06,032.007c]
GE07bhgce__u:787: ahaṃ sarvasya prabhavo mattaḥ sarvaṃ pravartate Bhg_10.008a
GE07bhgce__u:788: iti matvā bhajante māṃ budhā bhāvasamanvitāḥ Bhg_10.008c
GE07bhgce__u:790: kathayantaś ca māṃ nityaṃ tuṣyanti ca ramanti ca Bhg_10.009c
GE07bhgce__u:792: dadāmi buddhiyogaṃ taṃ yena mām upayānti te Bhg_10.010c [=MBh_06,032.010c]
GE07bhgce__u:793: teṣām evānukampārtham aham ajñānajaṃ tamaḥ Bhg_10.011a [=MBh_06,032.011a]
GE07bhgce__u:796: paraṃ brahma paraṃ dhāma pavitraṃ paramaṃ bhavān Bhg_10.012a
GE07bhgce__u:797: puruṣaṃ śāśvataṃ divyam ādidevam ajaṃ vibhum Bhg_10.012c
GE07bhgce__u:798: āhus tvām ṛṣayaḥ sarve devarṣir nāradas tathā Bhg_10.013a
GE07bhgce__u:799: asito devalo vyāsaḥ svayaṃ caiva bravīṣi me Bhg_10.013c [=MBh_06,032.013c]
GE07bhgce__u:800: sarvam etad ṛtaṃ manye yan māṃ vadasi keśava Bhg_10.014a
GE07bhgce__u:801: na hi te bhagavan vyaktiṃ vidur devā na dānavāḥ Bhg_10.014c
GE07bhgce__u:802: svayam evātmanātmānaṃ vettha tvaṃ puruṣottama Bhg_10.015a
GE07bhgce__u:804: vaktum arhasy aśeṣeṇa divyā hy ātmavibhūtayaḥ Bhg_10.016a
GE07bhgce__u:805: yābhir vibhūtibhir lokān imāṃs tvaṃ vyāpya tiṣṭhasi Bhg_10.016c
GE07bhgce__u:806: kathaṃ vidyām ahaṃ yogiṃs tvāṃ sadā paricintayan Bhg_10.017a
GE07bhgce__u:807: keṣu keṣu ca bhāveṣu cintyo 'si bhagavan mayā Bhg_10.017c
GE07bhgce__u:808: vistareṇātmano yogaṃ vibhūtiṃ ca janārdana Bhg_10.018a [=MBh_06,032.018a]
GE07bhgce__u:809: bhūyaḥ kathaya tṛptir hi śṛṇvato nāsti me 'mṛtam Bhg_10.018c
GE07bhgce__u:811: hanta te kathayiṣyāmi divyā hy ātmavibhūtayaḥ Bhg_10.019a
GE07bhgce__u:812: prādhānyataḥ kuruśreṣṭha nāsty anto vistarasya me Bhg_10.019c
GE07bhgce__u:814: aham ādiś ca madhyaṃ ca bhūtānām anta eva ca Bhg_10.020c
GE07bhgce__u:815: ādityānām ahaṃ viṣṇur jyotiṣāṃ ravir aṃśumān Bhg_10.021a
GE07bhgce__u:816: marīcir marutām asmi nakṣatrāṇām ahaṃ śaśī Bhg_10.021c [=MBh_06,032.021c]
GE07bhgce__u:817: vedānāṃ sāmavedo 'smi devānām asmi vāsavaḥ Bhg_10.022a [=MBh_06,032.022a]
GE07bhgce__u:818: indriyāṇāṃ manaś cāsmi bhūtānām asmi cetanā Bhg_10.022c [=MBh_06,032.022c]
GE07bhgce__u:819: rudrāṇāṃ śaṃkaraś cāsmi vitteśo yakṣarakṣasām Bhg_10.023a
GE07bhgce__u:820: vasūnāṃ pāvakaś cāsmi meruḥ śikhariṇām aham Bhg_10.023c [=MBh_06,032.023c]
GE07bhgce__u:821: purodhasāṃ ca mukhyaṃ māṃ viddhi pārtha bṛhaspatim Bhg_10.024a
GE07bhgce__u:822: senānīnām ahaṃ skandaḥ sarasām asmi sāgaraḥ Bhg_10.024c [=MBh_06,032.024c]
GE07bhgce__u:823: maharṣīṇāṃ bhṛgur ahaṃ girām asmy ekam akṣaram Bhg_10.025a
GE07bhgce__u:825: aśvatthaḥ sarvavṛkṣāṇāṃ devarṣīṇāṃ ca nāradaḥ Bhg_10.026a
GE07bhgce__u:826: gandharvāṇāṃ citrarathaḥ siddhānāṃ kapilo muniḥ Bhg_10.026c
GE07bhgce__u:827: uccaiḥśravasam aśvānāṃ viddhi mām amṛtodbhavam Bhg_10.027a
GE07bhgce__u:828: airāvataṃ gajendrāṇāṃ narāṇāṃ ca narādhipam Bhg_10.027c [=MBh_06,032.027c]
GE07bhgce__u:829: āyudhānām ahaṃ vajraṃ dhenūnām asmi kāmadhuk Bhg_10.028a
GE07bhgce__u:830: prajanaś cāsmi kandarpaḥ sarpāṇām asmi vāsukiḥ Bhg_10.028c
GE07bhgce__u:831: anantaś cāsmi nāgānāṃ varuṇo yādasām aham Bhg_10.029a [=MBh_06,032.029a]
GE07bhgce__u:832: pitṝṇām aryamā cāsmi yamaḥ saṃyamatām aham Bhg_10.029c [=MBh_06,032.029c]
GE07bhgce__u:833: prahlādaś cāsmi daityānāṃ kālaḥ kalayatām aham Bhg_10.030a
GE07bhgce__u:834: mṛgāṇāṃ ca mṛgendro 'haṃ vainateyaś ca pakṣiṇām Bhg_10.030c
GE07bhgce__u:835: pavanaḥ pavatām asmi rāmaḥ śastrabhṛtām aham Bhg_10.031a
GE07bhgce__u:836: jhaṣāṇāṃ makaraś cāsmi srotasām asmi jāhnavī Bhg_10.031c
GE07bhgce__u:837: sargāṇām ādir antaś ca madhyaṃ caivāham arjuna Bhg_10.032a
GE07bhgce__u:838: adhyātmavidyā vidyānāṃ vādaḥ pravadatām aham Bhg_10.032c
GE07bhgce__u:839: akṣarāṇām akāro 'smi dvaṃdvaḥ sāmāsikasya ca Bhg_10.033a
GE07bhgce__u:840: aham evākṣayaḥ kālo dhātāhaṃ viśvatomukhaḥ Bhg_10.033c [=MBh_06,032.033c]
GE07bhgce__u:841: mṛtyuḥ sarvaharaś cāham udbhavaś ca bhaviṣyatām Bhg_10.034a
GE07bhgce__u:842: kīrtiḥ śrīr vāk ca nārīṇāṃ smṛtir medhā dhṛtiḥ kṣamā Bhg_10.034c
GE07bhgce__u:843: bṛhatsāma tathā sāmnāṃ gāyatrī chandasām aham Bhg_10.035a
GE07bhgce__u:845: dyūtaṃ chalayatām asmi tejas tejasvinām aham Bhg_10.036a
GE07bhgce__u:846: jayo 'smi vyavasāyo 'smi sattvaṃ sattvavatām aham Bhg_10.036c
GE07bhgce__u:848: munīnām apy ahaṃ vyāsaḥ kavīnām uśanā kaviḥ Bhg_10.037c [=MBh_06,032.037c]
GE07bhgce__u:849: daṇḍo damayatām asmi nītir asmi jigīṣatām Bhg_10.038a [=MBh_06,032.038a]
GE07bhgce__u:850: maunaṃ caivāsmi guhyānāṃ jñānaṃ jñānavatām aham Bhg_10.038c
GE07bhgce__u:851: yac cāpi sarvabhūtānāṃ bījaṃ tad aham arjuna Bhg_10.039a
GE07bhgce__u:852: na tad asti vinā yat syān mayā bhūtaṃ carācaram Bhg_10.039c
GE07bhgce__u:853: nānto 'sti mama divyānāṃ vibhūtīnāṃ paraṃtapa Bhg_10.040a
GE07bhgce__u:854: eṣa tūddeśataḥ prokto vibhūter vistaro mayā Bhg_10.040c [=MBh_06,032.040c]
GE07bhgce__u:855: yad yad vibhūtimat sattvaṃ śrīmad ūrjitam eva vā Bhg_10.041a
GE07bhgce__u:856: tat tad evāvagaccha tvaṃ mama tejoṃśasaṃbhavam Bhg_10.041c
GE07bhgce__u:857: atha vā bahunaitena kiṃ jñātena tavārjuna Bhg_10.042a [=MBh_06,032.042a]
GE07bhgce__u:858: viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśena sthito jagat Bhg_10.042c
GE07bhgce__u:861: yat tvayoktaṃ vacas tena moho 'yaṃ vigato mama Bhg_11.001c
GE07bhgce__u:862: bhavāpyayau hi bhūtānāṃ śrutau vistaraśo mayā Bhg_11.002a
GE07bhgce__u:863: tvattaḥ kamalapatrākṣa māhātmyam api cāvyayam Bhg_11.002c
GE07bhgce__u:864: evam etad yathāttha tvam ātmānaṃ parameśvara Bhg_11.003a
GE07bhgce__u:865: draṣṭum icchāmi te rūpam aiśvaraṃ puruṣottama Bhg_11.003c
GE07bhgce__u:866: manyase yadi tac chakyaṃ mayā draṣṭum iti prabho Bhg_11.004a
GE07bhgce__u:867: yogeśvara tato me tvaṃ darśayātmānam avyayam Bhg_11.004c
GE07bhgce__u:869: paśya me pārtha rūpāṇi śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ Bhg_11.005a
GE07bhgce__u:871: paśyādityān vasūn rudrān aśvinau marutas tathā Bhg_11.006a
GE07bhgce__u:873: ihaikasthaṃ jagat kṛtsnaṃ paśyādya sacarācaram Bhg_11.007a
GE07bhgce__u:874: mama dehe guḍākeśa yac cānyad draṣṭum icchasi Bhg_11.007c
GE07bhgce__u:875: na tu māṃ śakyase draṣṭum anenaiva svacakṣuṣā Bhg_11.008a
GE07bhgce__u:876: divyaṃ dadāmi te cakṣuḥ paśya me yogam aiśvaram Bhg_11.008c
GE07bhgce__u:878: evam uktvā tato rājan mahāyogeśvaro hariḥ Bhg_11.009a [=MBh_06,033.009a]
GE07bhgce__u:879: darśayām āsa pārthāya paramaṃ rūpam aiśvaram Bhg_11.009c
GE07bhgce__u:884: divi sūryasahasrasya bhaved yugapad utthitā Bhg_11.012a [=MBh_06,033.012a]
GE07bhgce__u:885: yadi bhāḥ sadṛśī sā syād bhāsas tasya mahātmanaḥ Bhg_11.012c
GE07bhgce__u:886: tatraikasthaṃ jagat kṛtsnaṃ pravibhaktam anekadhā Bhg_11.013a
GE07bhgce__u:887: apaśyad devadevasya śarīre pāṇḍavas tadā Bhg_11.013c [=MBh_06,033.013c]
GE07bhgce__u:888: tataḥ sa vismayāviṣṭo hṛṣṭaromā dhanaṃjayaḥ Bhg_11.014a [=MBh_06,033.014a]
GE07bhgce__u:889: praṇamya śirasā devaṃ kṛtāñjalir abhāṣata Bhg_11.014c [=MBh_06,033.014c]
GE07bhgce__u:891: paśyāmi devāṃs tava deva dehe; sarvāṃs tathā bhūtaviśeṣasaṃghān
GE07bhgce__u:892: brahmāṇam īśaṃ kamalāsanastham; ṛṣīṃś ca sarvān uragāṃś ca divyān
GE07bhgce__u:894: nāntaṃ na madhyaṃ na punas tavādiṃ; paśyāmi viśveśvara viśvarūpa
GE07bhgce__u:895: kirīṭinaṃ gadinaṃ cakriṇaṃ ca; tejorāśiṃ sarvato dīptimantam Bhg_11.017a
GE07bhgce__u:896: paśyāmi tvāṃ durnirīkṣyaṃ samantād; dīptānalārkadyutim aprameyam Bhg_11.017c [=MBh_06,033.017c]
GE07bhgce__u:897: tvam akṣaraṃ paramaṃ veditavyaṃ; tvam asya viśvasya paraṃ nidhānam Bhg_11.018a [=MBh_06,033.018a]
GE07bhgce__u:898: tvam avyayaḥ śāśvatadharmagoptā; sanātanas tvaṃ puruṣo mato me Bhg_11.018c
GE07bhgce__u:900: paśyāmi tvāṃ dīptahutāśavaktraṃ; svatejasā viśvam idaṃ tapantam
GE07bhgce__u:901: dyāvāpṛthivyor idam antaraṃ hi; vyāptaṃ tvayaikena diśaś ca sarvāḥ Bhg_11.020a [=MBh_06,033.020a]
GE07bhgce__u:902: dṛṣṭvādbhutaṃ rūpam idaṃ tavograṃ; lokatrayaṃ pravyathitaṃ mahātman
GE07bhgce__u:903: amī hi tvā surasaṃghā viśanti; ke cid bhītāḥ prāñjalayo gṛṇanti Bhg_11.021a [=MBh_06,033.021a]
GE07bhgce__u:904: svastīty uktvā maharṣisiddhasaṃghāḥ; stuvanti tvāṃ stutibhiḥ puṣkalābhiḥ
GE07bhgce__u:905: rudrādityā vasavo ye ca sādhyā; viśve 'śvinau marutaś coṣmapāś ca
GE07bhgce__u:906: gandharvayakṣāsurasiddhasaṃghā; vīkṣante tvā vismitāś caiva sarve Bhg_11.022c [=MBh_06,033.022c]
GE07bhgce__u:907: rūpaṃ mahat te bahuvaktranetraṃ; mahābāho bahubāhūrupādam Bhg_11.023a
GE07bhgce__u:908: bahūdaraṃ bahudaṃṣṭrākarālaṃ; dṛṣṭvā lokāḥ pravyathitās tathāham
GE07bhgce__u:909: nabhaḥspṛśaṃ dīptam anekavarṇaṃ; vyāttānanaṃ dīptaviśālanetram Bhg_11.024a
GE07bhgce__u:910: dṛṣṭvā hi tvāṃ pravyathitāntarātmā; dhṛtiṃ na vindāmi śamaṃ ca viṣṇo
GE07bhgce__u:911: daṃṣṭrākarālāni ca te mukhāni; dṛṣṭvaiva kālānalasaṃnibhāni Bhg_11.025a
GE07bhgce__u:912: diśo na jāne na labhe ca śarma; prasīda deveśa jagannivāsa Bhg_11.025c
GE07bhgce__u:913: amī ca tvāṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putrāḥ; sarve sahaivāvanipālasaṃghaiḥ Bhg_11.026a [=MBh_06,033.026a]
GE07bhgce__u:914: bhīṣmo droṇaḥ sūtaputras tathāsau; sahāsmadīyair api yodhamukhyaiḥ
GE07bhgce__u:915: vaktrāṇi te tvaramāṇā viśanti; daṃṣṭrākarālāni bhayānakāni Bhg_11.027a
GE07bhgce__u:916: ke cid vilagnā daśanāntareṣu; saṃdṛśyante cūrṇitair uttamāṅgaiḥ
GE07bhgce__u:917: yathā nadīnāṃ bahavo 'mbuvegāḥ; samudram evābhimukhā dravanti Bhg_11.028a
GE07bhgce__u:918: tathā tavāmī naralokavīrā; viśanti vaktrāṇy abhivijvalanti Bhg_11.028c
GE07bhgce__u:919: yathā pradīptaṃ jvalanaṃ pataṃgā; viśanti nāśāya samṛddhavegāḥ Bhg_11.029a
GE07bhgce__u:920: tathaiva nāśāya viśanti lokās; tavāpi vaktrāṇi samṛddhavegāḥ Bhg_11.029c
GE07bhgce__u:921: lelihyase grasamānaḥ samantāl; lokān samagrān vadanair jvaladbhiḥ
GE07bhgce__u:922: tejobhir āpūrya jagat samagraṃ; bhāsas tavogrāḥ pratapanti viṣṇo
GE07bhgce__u:923: ākhyāhi me ko bhavān ugrarūpo; namo 'stu te devavara prasīda Bhg_11.031a
GE07bhgce__u:924: vijñātum icchāmi bhavantam ādyaṃ; na hi prajānāmi tava pravṛttim Bhg_11.031c [=MBh_06,033.031c]
GE07bhgce__u:926: kālo 'smi lokakṣayakṛt pravṛddho; lokān samāhartum iha pravṛttaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:927: ṛte 'pi tvā na bhaviṣyanti sarve; ye 'vasthitāḥ pratyanīkeṣu yodhāḥ Bhg_11.032c [=MBh_06,033.032c]
GE07bhgce__u:928: tasmāt tvam uttiṣṭha yaśo labhasva; jitvā śatrūn bhuṅkṣva rājyaṃ samṛddham Bhg_11.033a
GE07bhgce__u:929: mayaivaite nihatāḥ pūrvam eva; nimittamātraṃ bhava savyasācin Bhg_11.033c
GE07bhgce__u:930: droṇaṃ ca bhīṣmaṃ ca jayadrathaṃ ca; karṇaṃ tathānyān api yodhavīrān
GE07bhgce__u:931: mayā hatāṃs tvaṃ jahi mā vyathiṣṭhā; yudhyasva jetāsi raṇe sapatnān
GE07bhgce__u:933: etac chrutvā vacanaṃ keśavasya; kṛtāñjalir vepamānaḥ kirīṭī Bhg_11.035a
GE07bhgce__u:934: namaskṛtvā bhūya evāha kṛṣṇaṃ; sagadgadaṃ bhītabhītaḥ praṇamya Bhg_11.035c
GE07bhgce__u:936: sthāne hṛṣīkeśa tava prakīrtyā; jagat prahṛṣyaty anurajyate ca Bhg_11.036a
GE07bhgce__u:937: rakṣāṃsi bhītāni diśo dravanti; sarve namasyanti ca siddhasaṃghāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:938: kasmāc ca te na nameran mahātman; garīyase brahmaṇo 'py ādikartre
GE07bhgce__u:939: ananta deveśa jagannivāsa; tvam akṣaraṃ sad asat tatparaṃ yat Bhg_11.037c
GE07bhgce__u:940: tvam ādidevaḥ puruṣaḥ purāṇas; tvam asya viśvasya paraṃ nidhānam Bhg_11.038a [=MBh_06,033.038a]
GE07bhgce__u:941: vettāsi vedyaṃ ca paraṃ ca dhāma; tvayā tataṃ viśvam anantarūpa
GE07bhgce__u:942: vāyur yamo 'gnir varuṇaḥ śaśāṅkaḥ; prajāpatis tvaṃ prapitāmahaś ca
GE07bhgce__u:943: namo namas te 'stu sahasrakṛtvaḥ; punaś ca bhūyo 'pi namo namas te
GE07bhgce__u:944: namaḥ purastād atha pṛṣṭhatas te; namo 'stu te sarvata eva sarva
GE07bhgce__u:945: anantavīryāmitavikramas tvaṃ; sarvaṃ samāpnoṣi tato 'si sarvaḥ Bhg_11.040c
GE07bhgce__u:946: sakheti matvā prasabhaṃ yad uktaṃ; he kṛṣṇa he yādava he sakheti
GE07bhgce__u:947: ajānatā mahimānaṃ tavedaṃ; mayā pramādāt praṇayena vāpi Bhg_11.041c
GE07bhgce__u:949: eko 'tha vāpy acyuta tatsamakṣaṃ; tat kṣāmaye tvām aham aprameyam Bhg_11.042c [=MBh_06,033.042c]
GE07bhgce__u:950: pitāsi lokasya carācarasya; tvam asya pūjyaś ca gurur garīyān Bhg_11.043a
GE07bhgce__u:951: na tvatsamo 'sty abhyadhikaḥ kuto 'nyo; lokatraye 'py apratimaprabhāva
GE07bhgce__u:952: tasmāt praṇamya praṇidhāya kāyaṃ; prasādaye tvām aham īśam īḍyam Bhg_11.044a [=MBh_06,033.044a]
GE07bhgce__u:953: piteva putrasya sakheva sakhyuḥ; priyaḥ priyāyārhasi deva soḍhum
GE07bhgce__u:954: adṛṣṭapūrvaṃ hṛṣito 'smi dṛṣṭvā; bhayena ca pravyathitaṃ mano me Bhg_11.045a [=MBh_06,033.045a]
GE07bhgce__u:955: tad eva me darśaya deva rūpaṃ; prasīda deveśa jagannivāsa Bhg_11.045c
GE07bhgce__u:956: kirīṭinaṃ gadinaṃ cakrahastam; icchāmi tvāṃ draṣṭum ahaṃ tathaiva Bhg_11.046a [=MBh_06,033.046a]
GE07bhgce__u:957: tenaiva rūpeṇa caturbhujena; sahasrabāho bhava viśvamūrte Bhg_11.046c
GE07bhgce__u:959: mayā prasannena tavārjunedaṃ; rūpaṃ paraṃ darśitam ātmayogāt Bhg_11.047a
GE07bhgce__u:960: tejomayaṃ viśvam anantam ādyaṃ; yan me tvad anyena na dṛṣṭapūrvam
GE07bhgce__u:961: na vedayajñādhyayanair na dānair; na ca kriyābhir na tapobhir ugraiḥ
GE07bhgce__u:962: evaṃrūpaḥ śakya ahaṃ nṛloke; draṣṭuṃ tvad anyena kurupravīra Bhg_11.048c
GE07bhgce__u:963: mā te vyathā mā ca vimūḍhabhāvo; dṛṣṭvā rūpaṃ ghoram īdṛṅ mamedam Bhg_11.049a [=MBh_06,033.049a]
GE07bhgce__u:964: vyapetabhīḥ prītamanāḥ punas tvaṃ; tad eva me rūpam idaṃ prapaśya
GE07bhgce__u:966: ity arjunaṃ vāsudevas tathoktvā; svakaṃ rūpaṃ darśayām āsa bhūyaḥ Bhg_11.050a [=MBh_06,033.050a]
GE07bhgce__u:967: āśvāsayām āsa ca bhītam enaṃ; bhūtvā punaḥ saumyavapur mahātmā Bhg_11.050c
GE07bhgce__u:969: dṛṣṭvedaṃ mānuṣaṃ rūpaṃ tava saumyaṃ janārdana Bhg_11.051a
GE07bhgce__u:970: idānīm asmi saṃvṛttaḥ sacetāḥ prakṛtiṃ gataḥ Bhg_11.051c
GE07bhgce__u:972: sudurdarśam idaṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭavān asi yan mama Bhg_11.052a
GE07bhgce__u:973: devā apy asya rūpasya nityaṃ darśanakāṅkṣiṇaḥ Bhg_11.052c
GE07bhgce__u:974: nāhaṃ vedair na tapasā na dānena na cejyayā Bhg_11.053a [=MBh_06,033.053a]
GE07bhgce__u:975: śakya evaṃvidho draṣṭuṃ dṛṣṭavān asi māṃ yathā Bhg_11.053c
GE07bhgce__u:976: bhaktyā tv ananyayā śakya aham evaṃvidho 'rjuna Bhg_11.054a
GE07bhgce__u:977: jñātuṃ draṣṭuṃ ca tattvena praveṣṭuṃ ca paraṃtapa Bhg_11.054c
GE07bhgce__u:979: nirvairaḥ sarvabhūteṣu yaḥ sa mām eti pāṇḍava Bhg_11.055c
GE07bhgce__u:981: evaṃ satatayuktā ye bhaktās tvāṃ paryupāsate Bhg_12.001a
GE07bhgce__u:982: ye cāpy akṣaram avyaktaṃ teṣāṃ ke yogavittamāḥ Bhg_12.001c
GE07bhgce__u:984: mayy āveśya mano ye māṃ nityayuktā upāsate Bhg_12.002a [=MBh_06,034.002a]
GE07bhgce__u:985: śraddhayā parayopetās te me yuktatamā matāḥ Bhg_12.002c [=MBh_06,034.002c]
GE07bhgce__u:986: ye tv akṣaram anirdeśyam avyaktaṃ paryupāsate Bhg_12.003a
GE07bhgce__u:987: sarvatragam acintyaṃ ca kūṭastham acalaṃ dhruvam Bhg_12.003c
GE07bhgce__u:989: te prāpnuvanti mām eva sarvabhūtahite ratāḥ Bhg_12.004c [=MBh_06,034.004c]
GE07bhgce__u:991: avyaktā hi gatir duḥkhaṃ dehavadbhir avāpyate Bhg_12.005c
GE07bhgce__u:992: ye tu sarvāṇi karmāṇi mayi saṃnyasya matparāḥ Bhg_12.006a
GE07bhgce__u:993: ananyenaiva yogena māṃ dhyāyanta upāsate Bhg_12.006c [=MBh_06,034.006c]
GE07bhgce__u:995: bhavāmi nacirāt pārtha mayy āveśitacetasām Bhg_12.007c [=MBh_06,034.007c]
GE07bhgce__u:996: mayy eva mana ādhatsva mayi buddhiṃ niveśaya Bhg_12.008a
GE07bhgce__u:997: nivasiṣyasi mayy eva ata ūrdhvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ Bhg_12.008c
GE07bhgce__u:998: atha cittaṃ samādhātuṃ na śaknoṣi mayi sthiram Bhg_12.009a
GE07bhgce__u:999: abhyāsayogena tato mām icchāptuṃ dhanaṃjaya Bhg_12.009c [=MBh_06,034.009c]
GE07bhgce__u:1001: madartham api karmāṇi kurvan siddhim avāpsyasi Bhg_12.010c
GE07bhgce__u:1002: athaitad apy aśakto 'si kartuṃ madyogam āśritaḥ Bhg_12.011a
GE07bhgce__u:1004: śreyo hi jñānam abhyāsāj jñānād dhyānaṃ viśiṣyate Bhg_12.012a
GE07bhgce__u:1005: dhyānāt karmaphalatyāgas tyāgāc chāntir anantaram Bhg_12.012c
GE07bhgce__u:1006: adveṣṭā sarvabhūtānāṃ maitraḥ karuṇa eva ca Bhg_12.013a [=MBh_06,034.013a]
GE07bhgce__u:1008: saṃtuṣṭaḥ satataṃ yogī yatātmā dṛḍhaniścayaḥ Bhg_12.014a
GE07bhgce__u:1009: mayy arpitamanobuddhir yo madbhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ Bhg_12.014c
GE07bhgce__u:1010: yasmān nodvijate loko lokān nodvijate ca yaḥ Bhg_12.015a
GE07bhgce__u:1011: harṣāmarṣabhayodvegair mukto yaḥ sa ca me priyaḥ Bhg_12.015c
GE07bhgce__u:1012: anapekṣaḥ śucir dakṣa udāsīno gatavyathaḥ Bhg_12.016a [=MBh_06,034.016a]
GE07bhgce__u:1013: sarvārambhaparityāgī yo madbhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ Bhg_12.016c
GE07bhgce__u:1014: yo na hṛṣyati na dveṣṭi na śocati na kāṅkṣati Bhg_12.017a
GE07bhgce__u:1015: śubhāśubhaparityāgī bhaktimān yaḥ sa me priyaḥ Bhg_12.017c
GE07bhgce__u:1016: samaḥ śatrau ca mitre ca tathā mānāvamānayoḥ Bhg_12.018a
GE07bhgce__u:1018: tulyanindāstutir maunī saṃtuṣṭo yena kena cit Bhg_12.019a
GE07bhgce__u:1019: aniketaḥ sthiramatir bhaktimān me priyo naraḥ Bhg_12.019c
GE07bhgce__u:1020: ye tu dharmyāmṛtam idaṃ yathoktaṃ paryupāsate Bhg_12.020a
GE07bhgce__u:1021: śraddadhānā matparamā bhaktās te 'tīva me priyāḥ Bhg_12.020c
GE07bhgce__u:1023: idaṃ śarīraṃ kaunteya kṣetram ity abhidhīyate Bhg_13.001a
GE07bhgce__u:1024: etad yo vetti taṃ prāhuḥ kṣetrajña iti tadvidaḥ Bhg_13.001c
GE07bhgce__u:1025: kṣetrajñaṃ cāpi māṃ viddhi sarvakṣetreṣu bhārata Bhg_13.002a
GE07bhgce__u:1026: kṣetrakṣetrajñayor jñānaṃ yat taj jñānaṃ mataṃ mama Bhg_13.002c
GE07bhgce__u:1027: tat kṣetraṃ yac ca yādṛk ca yadvikāri yataś ca yat Bhg_13.003a
GE07bhgce__u:1028: sa ca yo yatprabhāvaś ca tat samāsena me śṛṇu Bhg_13.003c
GE07bhgce__u:1029: ṛṣibhir bahudhā gītaṃ chandobhir vividhaiḥ pṛthak Bhg_13.004a
GE07bhgce__u:1031: mahābhūtāny ahaṃkāro buddhir avyaktam eva ca Bhg_13.005a
GE07bhgce__u:1032: indriyāṇi daśaikaṃ ca pañca cendriyagocarāḥ Bhg_13.005c [=MBh_06,035.005c]
GE07bhgce__u:1033: icchā dveṣaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃghātaś cetanā dhṛtiḥ Bhg_13.006a
GE07bhgce__u:1034: etat kṣetraṃ samāsena savikāram udāhṛtam Bhg_13.006c [=MBh_06,035.006c]
GE07bhgce__u:1035: amānitvam adambhitvam ahiṃsā kṣāntir ārjavam Bhg_13.007a
GE07bhgce__u:1037: indriyārtheṣu vairāgyam anahaṃkāra eva ca Bhg_13.008a [=MBh_06,035.008a]
GE07bhgce__u:1044: etaj jñānam iti proktam ajñānaṃ yad ato 'nyathā Bhg_13.011c
GE07bhgce__u:1045: jñeyaṃ yat tat pravakṣyāmi yaj jñātvāmṛtam aśnute Bhg_13.012a
GE07bhgce__u:1046: anādimat paraṃ brahma na sat tan nāsad ucyate Bhg_13.012c
GE07bhgce__u:1048: sarvataḥśrutimal loke sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭhati Bhg_13.013c
GE07bhgce__u:1050: asaktaṃ sarvabhṛc caiva nirguṇaṃ guṇabhoktṛ ca Bhg_13.014c
GE07bhgce__u:1051: bahir antaś ca bhūtānām acaraṃ caram eva ca Bhg_13.015a [=MBh_06,035.015a]
GE07bhgce__u:1052: sūkṣmatvāt tad avijñeyaṃ dūrasthaṃ cāntike ca tat Bhg_13.015c
GE07bhgce__u:1053: avibhaktaṃ ca bhūteṣu vibhaktam iva ca sthitam Bhg_13.016a
GE07bhgce__u:1054: bhūtabhartṛ ca taj jñeyaṃ grasiṣṇu prabhaviṣṇu ca Bhg_13.016c
GE07bhgce__u:1055: jyotiṣām api taj jyotis tamasaḥ param ucyate Bhg_13.017a
GE07bhgce__u:1056: jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ jñānagamyaṃ hṛdi sarvasya viṣṭhitam Bhg_13.017c
GE07bhgce__u:1057: iti kṣetraṃ tathā jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ coktaṃ samāsataḥ Bhg_13.018a
GE07bhgce__u:1059: prakṛtiṃ puruṣaṃ caiva viddhy anādī ubhāv api Bhg_13.019a
GE07bhgce__u:1060: vikārāṃś ca guṇāṃś caiva viddhi prakṛtisaṃbhavān Bhg_13.019c
GE07bhgce__u:1062: puruṣaḥ sukhaduḥkhānāṃ bhoktṛtve hetur ucyate Bhg_13.020c
GE07bhgce__u:1063: puruṣaḥ prakṛtistho hi bhuṅkte prakṛtijān guṇān Bhg_13.021a
GE07bhgce__u:1065: upadraṣṭānumantā ca bhartā bhoktā maheśvaraḥ Bhg_13.022a
GE07bhgce__u:1066: paramātmeti cāpy ukto dehe 'smin puruṣaḥ paraḥ Bhg_13.022c
GE07bhgce__u:1067: ya evaṃ vetti puruṣaṃ prakṛtiṃ ca guṇaiḥ saha Bhg_13.023a
GE07bhgce__u:1068: sarvathā vartamāno 'pi na sa bhūyo 'bhijāyate Bhg_13.023c
GE07bhgce__u:1069: dhyānenātmani paśyanti ke cid ātmānam ātmanā Bhg_13.024a
GE07bhgce__u:1070: anye sāṃkhyena yogena karmayogena cāpare Bhg_13.024c [=MBh_06,035.024c]
GE07bhgce__u:1071: anye tv evam ajānantaḥ śrutvānyebhya upāsate Bhg_13.025a
GE07bhgce__u:1072: te 'pi cātitaranty eva mṛtyuṃ śrutiparāyaṇāḥ Bhg_13.025c
GE07bhgce__u:1073: yāvat saṃjāyate kiṃ cit sattvaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam Bhg_13.026a
GE07bhgce__u:1075: samaṃ sarveṣu bhūteṣu tiṣṭhantaṃ parameśvaram Bhg_13.027a
GE07bhgce__u:1076: vinaśyatsv avinaśyantaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati Bhg_13.027c
GE07bhgce__u:1077: samaṃ paśyan hi sarvatra samavasthitam īśvaram Bhg_13.028a
GE07bhgce__u:1078: na hinasty ātmanātmānaṃ tato yāti parāṃ gatim Bhg_13.028c
GE07bhgce__u:1079: prakṛtyaiva ca karmāṇi kriyamāṇāni sarvaśaḥ Bhg_13.029a [=MBh_06,035.029a]
GE07bhgce__u:1080: yaḥ paśyati tathātmānam akartāraṃ sa paśyati Bhg_13.029c
GE07bhgce__u:1082: tata eva ca vistāraṃ brahma saṃpadyate tadā Bhg_13.030c [=MBh_06,035.030c]
GE07bhgce__u:1084: śarīrastho 'pi kaunteya na karoti na lipyate Bhg_13.031c
GE07bhgce__u:1085: yathā sarvagataṃ saukṣmyād ākāśaṃ nopalipyate Bhg_13.032a
GE07bhgce__u:1087: yathā prakāśayaty ekaḥ kṛtsnaṃ lokam imaṃ raviḥ Bhg_13.033a
GE07bhgce__u:1088: kṣetraṃ kṣetrī tathā kṛtsnaṃ prakāśayati bhārata Bhg_13.033c
GE07bhgce__u:1090: bhūtaprakṛtimokṣaṃ ca ye vidur yānti te param Bhg_13.034c
GE07bhgce__u:1092: paraṃ bhūyaḥ pravakṣyāmi jñānānāṃ jñānam uttamam Bhg_14.001a
GE07bhgce__u:1093: yaj jñātvā munayaḥ sarve parāṃ siddhim ito gatāḥ Bhg_14.001c
GE07bhgce__u:1094: idaṃ jñānam upāśritya mama sādharmyam āgatāḥ Bhg_14.002a
GE07bhgce__u:1095: sarge 'pi nopajāyante pralaye na vyathanti ca Bhg_14.002c
GE07bhgce__u:1096: mama yonir mahad brahma tasmin garbhaṃ dadhāmy aham Bhg_14.003a
GE07bhgce__u:1097: saṃbhavaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tato bhavati bhārata Bhg_14.003c
GE07bhgce__u:1098: sarvayoniṣu kaunteya mūrtayaḥ saṃbhavanti yāḥ Bhg_14.004a
GE07bhgce__u:1099: tāsāṃ brahma mahad yonir ahaṃ bījapradaḥ pitā Bhg_14.004c
GE07bhgce__u:1100: sattvaṃ rajas tama iti guṇāḥ prakṛtisaṃbhavāḥ Bhg_14.005a
GE07bhgce__u:1101: nibadhnanti mahābāho dehe dehinam avyayam Bhg_14.005c [=MBh_06,036.005c]
GE07bhgce__u:1102: tatra sattvaṃ nirmalatvāt prakāśakam anāmayam Bhg_14.006a
GE07bhgce__u:1105: tan nibadhnāti kaunteya karmasaṅgena dehinam Bhg_14.007c
GE07bhgce__u:1106: tamas tv ajñānajaṃ viddhi mohanaṃ sarvadehinām Bhg_14.008a
GE07bhgce__u:1108: sattvaṃ sukhe sañjayati rajaḥ karmaṇi bhārata Bhg_14.009a
GE07bhgce__u:1109: jñānam āvṛtya tu tamaḥ pramāde sañjayaty uta Bhg_14.009c
GE07bhgce__u:1110: rajas tamaś cābhibhūya sattvaṃ bhavati bhārata Bhg_14.010a
GE07bhgce__u:1111: rajaḥ sattvaṃ tamaś caiva tamaḥ sattvaṃ rajas tathā Bhg_14.010c
GE07bhgce__u:1113: jñānaṃ yadā tadā vidyād vivṛddhaṃ sattvam ity uta Bhg_14.011c
GE07bhgce__u:1114: lobhaḥ pravṛttir ārambhaḥ karmaṇām aśamaḥ spṛhā Bhg_14.012a
GE07bhgce__u:1115: rajasy etāni jāyante vivṛddhe bharatarṣabha Bhg_14.012c [=MBh_06,036.012c]
GE07bhgce__u:1116: aprakāśo 'pravṛttiś ca pramādo moha eva ca Bhg_14.013a [=MBh_06,036.013a]
GE07bhgce__u:1117: tamasy etāni jāyante vivṛddhe kurunandana Bhg_14.013c [=MBh_06,036.013c]
GE07bhgce__u:1118: yadā sattve pravṛddhe tu pralayaṃ yāti dehabhṛt Bhg_14.014a
GE07bhgce__u:1120: rajasi pralayaṃ gatvā karmasaṅgiṣu jāyate Bhg_14.015a [=MBh_06,036.015a]
GE07bhgce__u:1121: tathā pralīnas tamasi mūḍhayoniṣu jāyate Bhg_14.015c [=MBh_06,036.015c]
GE07bhgce__u:1122: karmaṇaḥ sukṛtasyāhuḥ sāttvikaṃ nirmalaṃ phalam Bhg_14.016a
GE07bhgce__u:1123: rajasas tu phalaṃ duḥkham ajñānaṃ tamasaḥ phalam Bhg_14.016c
GE07bhgce__u:1124: sattvāt saṃjāyate jñānaṃ rajaso lobha eva ca Bhg_14.017a
GE07bhgce__u:1125: pramādamohau tamaso bhavato 'jñānam eva ca Bhg_14.017c [=MBh_06,036.017c]
GE07bhgce__u:1126: ūrdhvaṃ gacchanti sattvasthā madhye tiṣṭhanti rājasāḥ Bhg_14.018a
GE07bhgce__u:1128: nānyaṃ guṇebhyaḥ kartāraṃ yadā draṣṭānupaśyati Bhg_14.019a
GE07bhgce__u:1129: guṇebhyaś ca paraṃ vetti madbhāvaṃ so 'dhigacchati Bhg_14.019c
GE07bhgce__u:1130: guṇān etān atītya trīn dehī dehasamudbhavān Bhg_14.020a [=MBh_06,036.020a]
GE07bhgce__u:1133: kair liṅgais trīn guṇān etān atīto bhavati prabho Bhg_14.021a
GE07bhgce__u:1134: kimācāraḥ kathaṃ caitāṃs trīn guṇān ativartate Bhg_14.021c
GE07bhgce__u:1136: prakāśaṃ ca pravṛttiṃ ca moham eva ca pāṇḍava Bhg_14.022a
GE07bhgce__u:1137: na dveṣṭi saṃpravṛttāni na nivṛttāni kāṅkṣati Bhg_14.022c
GE07bhgce__u:1138: udāsīnavad āsīno guṇair yo na vicālyate Bhg_14.023a [=MBh_06,036.023a]
GE07bhgce__u:1139: guṇā vartanta ity eva yo 'vatiṣṭhati neṅgate Bhg_14.023c
GE07bhgce__u:1144: māṃ ca yo 'vyabhicāreṇa bhaktiyogena sevate Bhg_14.026a [=MBh_06,036.026a]
GE07bhgce__u:1145: sa guṇān samatītyaitān brahmabhūyāya kalpate Bhg_14.026c
GE07bhgce__u:1146: brahmaṇo hi pratiṣṭhāham amṛtasyāvyayasya ca Bhg_14.027a
GE07bhgce__u:1147: śāśvatasya ca dharmasya sukhasyaikāntikasya ca Bhg_14.027c
GE07bhgce__u:1149: ūrdhvamūlam adhaḥśākham aśvatthaṃ prāhur avyayam Bhg_15.001a
GE07bhgce__u:1150: chandāṃsi yasya parṇāni yas taṃ veda sa vedavit Bhg_15.001c
GE07bhgce__u:1151: adhaś cordhvaṃ prasṛtās tasya śākhā; guṇapravṛddhā viṣayapravālāḥ Bhg_15.002a [=MBh_06,037.002a]
GE07bhgce__u:1152: adhaś ca mūlāny anusaṃtatāni; karmānubandhīni manuṣyaloke Bhg_15.002c
GE07bhgce__u:1153: na rūpam asyeha tathopalabhyate; nānto na cādir na ca saṃpratiṣṭhā
GE07bhgce__u:1154: aśvattham enaṃ suvirūḍhamūlam; asaṅgaśastreṇa dṛḍhena chittvā Bhg_15.003c
GE07bhgce__u:1155: tataḥ padaṃ tatparimārgitavyaṃ; yasmin gatā na nivartanti bhūyaḥ Bhg_15.004a [=MBh_06,037.004a]
GE07bhgce__u:1156: tam eva cādyaṃ puruṣaṃ prapadye; yataḥ pravṛttiḥ prasṛtā purāṇī
GE07bhgce__u:1158: dvaṃdvair vimuktāḥ sukhaduḥkhasaṃjñair; gacchanty amūḍhāḥ padam avyayaṃ tat Bhg_15.005c [=MBh_06,037.005c]
GE07bhgce__u:1159: na tad bhāsayate sūryo na śaśāṅko na pāvakaḥ Bhg_15.006a
GE07bhgce__u:1160: yad gatvā na nivartante tad dhāma paramaṃ mama Bhg_15.006c
GE07bhgce__u:1163: śarīraṃ yad avāpnoti yac cāpy utkrāmatīśvaraḥ Bhg_15.008a
GE07bhgce__u:1164: gṛhītvaitāni saṃyāti vāyur gandhān ivāśayāt Bhg_15.008c [=MBh_06,037.008c]
GE07bhgce__u:1165: śrotraṃ cakṣuḥ sparśanaṃ ca rasanaṃ ghrāṇam eva ca Bhg_15.009a
GE07bhgce__u:1166: adhiṣṭhāya manaś cāyaṃ viṣayān upasevate Bhg_15.009c [=MBh_06,037.009c]
GE07bhgce__u:1167: utkrāmantaṃ sthitaṃ vāpi bhuñjānaṃ vā guṇānvitam Bhg_15.010a
GE07bhgce__u:1169: yatanto yoginaś cainaṃ paśyanty ātmany avasthitam Bhg_15.011a
GE07bhgce__u:1170: yatanto 'py akṛtātmāno nainaṃ paśyanty acetasaḥ Bhg_15.011c
GE07bhgce__u:1171: yad ādityagataṃ tejo jagad bhāsayate 'khilam Bhg_15.012a
GE07bhgce__u:1172: yac candramasi yac cāgnau tat tejo viddhi māmakam Bhg_15.012c
GE07bhgce__u:1173: gām āviśya ca bhūtāni dhārayāmy aham ojasā Bhg_15.013a [=MBh_06,037.013a]
GE07bhgce__u:1174: puṣṇāmi cauṣadhīḥ sarvāḥ somo bhūtvā rasātmakaḥ Bhg_15.013c
GE07bhgce__u:1175: ahaṃ vaiśvānaro bhūtvā prāṇināṃ deham āśritaḥ Bhg_15.014a
GE07bhgce__u:1177: sarvasya cāhaṃ hṛdi saṃniviṣṭo; mattaḥ smṛtir jñānam apohanaṃ ca Bhg_15.015a [=MBh_06,037.015a]
GE07bhgce__u:1178: vedaiś ca sarvair aham eva vedyo; vedāntakṛd vedavid eva cāham Bhg_15.015c
GE07bhgce__u:1179: dvāv imau puruṣau loke kṣaraś cākṣara eva ca Bhg_15.016a
GE07bhgce__u:1180: kṣaraḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni kūṭastho 'kṣara ucyate Bhg_15.016c
GE07bhgce__u:1181: uttamaḥ puruṣas tv anyaḥ paramātmety udāhṛtaḥ Bhg_15.017a
GE07bhgce__u:1182: yo lokatrayam āviśya bibharty avyaya īśvaraḥ Bhg_15.017c
GE07bhgce__u:1183: yasmāt kṣaram atīto 'ham akṣarād api cottamaḥ Bhg_15.018a
GE07bhgce__u:1184: ato 'smi loke vede ca prathitaḥ puruṣottamaḥ Bhg_15.018c
GE07bhgce__u:1185: yo mām evam asaṃmūḍho jānāti puruṣottamam Bhg_15.019a [=MBh_06,037.019a]
GE07bhgce__u:1186: sa sarvavid bhajati māṃ sarvabhāvena bhārata Bhg_15.019c
GE07bhgce__u:1187: iti guhyatamaṃ śāstram idam uktaṃ mayānagha Bhg_15.020a [=MBh_06,037.020a]
GE07bhgce__u:1188: etad buddhvā buddhimān syāt kṛtakṛtyaś ca bhārata Bhg_15.020c
GE07bhgce__u:1191: dānaṃ damaś ca yajñaś ca svādhyāyas tapa ārjavam Bhg_16.001c
GE07bhgce__u:1192: ahiṃsā satyam akrodhas tyāgaḥ śāntir apaiśunam Bhg_16.002a
GE07bhgce__u:1193: dayā bhūteṣv aloluptvaṃ mārdavaṃ hrīr acāpalam Bhg_16.002c
GE07bhgce__u:1194: tejaḥ kṣamā dhṛtiḥ śaucam adroho nātimānitā Bhg_16.003a [=MBh_06,038.003a]
GE07bhgce__u:1195: bhavanti saṃpadaṃ daivīm abhijātasya bhārata Bhg_16.003c
GE07bhgce__u:1196: dambho darpo 'timānaś ca krodhaḥ pāruṣyam eva ca Bhg_16.004a
GE07bhgce__u:1197: ajñānaṃ cābhijātasya pārtha saṃpadam āsurīm Bhg_16.004c [=MBh_06,038.004c]
GE07bhgce__u:1198: daivī saṃpad vimokṣāya nibandhāyāsurī matā Bhg_16.005a [=MBh_06,038.005a]
GE07bhgce__u:1199: mā śucaḥ saṃpadaṃ daivīm abhijāto 'si pāṇḍava Bhg_16.005c
GE07bhgce__u:1200: dvau bhūtasargau loke 'smin daiva āsura eva ca Bhg_16.006a
GE07bhgce__u:1201: daivo vistaraśaḥ prokta āsuraṃ pārtha me śṛṇu Bhg_16.006c
GE07bhgce__u:1202: pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca janā na vidur āsurāḥ Bhg_16.007a
GE07bhgce__u:1203: na śaucaṃ nāpi cācāro na satyaṃ teṣu vidyate Bhg_16.007c
GE07bhgce__u:1204: asatyam apratiṣṭhaṃ te jagad āhur anīśvaram Bhg_16.008a [=MBh_06,038.008a]
GE07bhgce__u:1210: cintām aparimeyāṃ ca pralayāntām upāśritāḥ Bhg_16.011a [=MBh_06,038.011a]
GE07bhgce__u:1214: idam adya mayā labdham idaṃ prāpsye manoratham Bhg_16.013a
GE07bhgce__u:1215: idam astīdam api me bhaviṣyati punar dhanam Bhg_16.013c [=MBh_06,038.013c]
GE07bhgce__u:1216: asau mayā hataḥ śatrur haniṣye cāparān api Bhg_16.014a [=MBh_06,038.014a]
GE07bhgce__u:1217: īśvaro 'ham ahaṃ bhogī siddho 'haṃ balavān sukhī Bhg_16.014c
GE07bhgce__u:1218: āḍhyo 'bhijanavān asmi ko 'nyo 'sti sadṛśo mayā Bhg_16.015a
GE07bhgce__u:1219: yakṣye dāsyāmi modiṣya ity ajñānavimohitāḥ Bhg_16.015c [=MBh_06,038.015c]
GE07bhgce__u:1224: ahaṃkāraṃ balaṃ darpaṃ kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca saṃśritāḥ Bhg_16.018a
GE07bhgce__u:1226: tān ahaṃ dviṣataḥ krūrān saṃsāreṣu narādhamān Bhg_16.019a
GE07bhgce__u:1227: kṣipāmy ajasram aśubhān āsurīṣv eva yoniṣu Bhg_16.019c [=MBh_06,038.019c]
GE07bhgce__u:1228: āsurīṃ yonim āpannā mūḍhā janmani janmani Bhg_16.020a [=MBh_06,038.020a]
GE07bhgce__u:1229: mām aprāpyaiva kaunteya tato yānty adhamāṃ gatim Bhg_16.020c
GE07bhgce__u:1230: trividhaṃ narakasyedaṃ dvāraṃ nāśanam ātmanaḥ Bhg_16.021a
GE07bhgce__u:1231: kāmaḥ krodhas tathā lobhas tasmād etat trayaṃ tyajet Bhg_16.021c
GE07bhgce__u:1232: etair vimuktaḥ kaunteya tamodvārais tribhir naraḥ Bhg_16.022a
GE07bhgce__u:1233: ācaraty ātmanaḥ śreyas tato yāti parāṃ gatim Bhg_16.022c
