GE07bhgce__u:1234: yaḥ śāstravidhim utsṛjya vartate kāmakārataḥ Bhg_16.023a
GE07bhgce__u:1235: na sa siddhim avāpnoti na sukhaṃ na parāṃ gatim Bhg_16.023c
GE07bhgce__u:1236: tasmāc chāstraṃ pramāṇaṃ te kāryākāryavyavasthitau Bhg_16.024a
GE07bhgce__u:1237: jñātvā śāstravidhānoktaṃ karma kartum ihārhasi Bhg_16.024c
GE07bhgce__u:1239: ye śāstravidhim utsṛjya yajante śraddhayānvitāḥ Bhg_17.001a
GE07bhgce__u:1240: teṣāṃ niṣṭhā tu kā kṛṣṇa sattvam āho rajas tamaḥ Bhg_17.001c
GE07bhgce__u:1242: trividhā bhavati śraddhā dehināṃ sā svabhāvajā Bhg_17.002a
GE07bhgce__u:1243: sāttvikī rājasī caiva tāmasī ceti tāṃ śṛṇu Bhg_17.002c [=MBh_06,039.002c]
GE07bhgce__u:1244: sattvānurūpā sarvasya śraddhā bhavati bhārata Bhg_17.003a
GE07bhgce__u:1245: śraddhāmayo 'yaṃ puruṣo yo yacchraddhaḥ sa eva saḥ Bhg_17.003c
GE07bhgce__u:1246: yajante sāttvikā devān yakṣarakṣāṃsi rājasāḥ Bhg_17.004a
GE07bhgce__u:1247: pretān bhūtagaṇāṃś cānye yajante tāmasā janāḥ Bhg_17.004c
GE07bhgce__u:1248: aśāstravihitaṃ ghoraṃ tapyante ye tapo janāḥ Bhg_17.005a
GE07bhgce__u:1251: māṃ caivāntaḥśarīrasthaṃ tān viddhy āsuraniścayān Bhg_17.006c
GE07bhgce__u:1252: āhāras tv api sarvasya trividho bhavati priyaḥ Bhg_17.007a
GE07bhgce__u:1253: yajñas tapas tathā dānaṃ teṣāṃ bhedam imaṃ śṛṇu Bhg_17.007c
GE07bhgce__u:1255: rasyāḥ snigdhāḥ sthirā hṛdyā āhārāḥ sāttvikapriyāḥ Bhg_17.008c
GE07bhgce__u:1258: yātayāmaṃ gatarasaṃ pūti paryuṣitaṃ ca yat Bhg_17.010a [=MBh_06,039.010a]
GE07bhgce__u:1259: ucchiṣṭam api cāmedhyaṃ bhojanaṃ tāmasapriyam Bhg_17.010c
GE07bhgce__u:1260: aphalākāṅkṣibhir yajño vidhidṛṣṭo ya ijyate Bhg_17.011a [=MBh_06,039.011a]
GE07bhgce__u:1261: yaṣṭavyam eveti manaḥ samādhāya sa sāttvikaḥ Bhg_17.011c
GE07bhgce__u:1262: abhisaṃdhāya tu phalaṃ dambhārtham api caiva yat Bhg_17.012a
GE07bhgce__u:1263: ijyate bharataśreṣṭha taṃ yajñaṃ viddhi rājasam Bhg_17.012c
GE07bhgce__u:1267: brahmacaryam ahiṃsā ca śārīraṃ tapa ucyate Bhg_17.014c [=MBh_06,039.014c]
GE07bhgce__u:1268: anudvegakaraṃ vākyaṃ satyaṃ priyahitaṃ ca yat Bhg_17.015a
GE07bhgce__u:1269: svādhyāyābhyasanaṃ caiva vāṅmayaṃ tapa ucyate Bhg_17.015c
GE07bhgce__u:1271: bhāvasaṃśuddhir ity etat tapo mānasam ucyate Bhg_17.016c
GE07bhgce__u:1272: śraddhayā parayā taptaṃ tapas tat trividhaṃ naraiḥ Bhg_17.017a
GE07bhgce__u:1274: satkāramānapūjārthaṃ tapo dambhena caiva yat Bhg_17.018a
GE07bhgce__u:1275: kriyate tad iha proktaṃ rājasaṃ calam adhruvam Bhg_17.018c
GE07bhgce__u:1276: mūḍhagrāheṇātmano yat pīḍayā kriyate tapaḥ Bhg_17.019a [=MBh_06,039.019a]
GE07bhgce__u:1277: parasyotsādanārthaṃ vā tat tāmasam udāhṛtam Bhg_17.019c [=MBh_06,039.019c]
GE07bhgce__u:1278: dātavyam iti yad dānaṃ dīyate 'nupakāriṇe Bhg_17.020a [=MBh_06,039.020a]
GE07bhgce__u:1279: deśe kāle ca pātre ca tad dānaṃ sāttvikaṃ smṛtam Bhg_17.020c
GE07bhgce__u:1280: yat tu pratyupakārārthaṃ phalam uddiśya vā punaḥ Bhg_17.021a
GE07bhgce__u:1281: dīyate ca parikliṣṭaṃ tad dānaṃ rājasaṃ smṛtam Bhg_17.021c
GE07bhgce__u:1282: adeśakāle yad dānam apātrebhyaś ca dīyate Bhg_17.022a [=MBh_06,039.022a]
GE07bhgce__u:1283: asatkṛtam avajñātaṃ tat tāmasam udāhṛtam Bhg_17.022c [=MBh_06,039.022c]
GE07bhgce__u:1284: oṃ tat sad iti nirdeśo brahmaṇas trividhaḥ smṛtaḥ Bhg_17.023a
GE07bhgce__u:1285: brāhmaṇās tena vedāś ca yajñāś ca vihitāḥ purā Bhg_17.023c
GE07bhgce__u:1286: tasmād om ity udāhṛtya yajñadānatapaḥkriyāḥ Bhg_17.024a [=MBh_06,039.024a]
GE07bhgce__u:1288: tad ity anabhisaṃdhāya phalaṃ yajñatapaḥkriyāḥ Bhg_17.025a
GE07bhgce__u:1289: dānakriyāś ca vividhāḥ kriyante mokṣakāṅkṣibhiḥ Bhg_17.025c
GE07bhgce__u:1290: sadbhāve sādhubhāve ca sad ity etat prayujyate Bhg_17.026a
GE07bhgce__u:1291: praśaste karmaṇi tathā sacchabdaḥ pārtha yujyate Bhg_17.026c
GE07bhgce__u:1292: yajñe tapasi dāne ca sthitiḥ sad iti cocyate Bhg_17.027a
GE07bhgce__u:1293: karma caiva tadarthīyaṃ sad ity evābhidhīyate Bhg_17.027c
GE07bhgce__u:1294: aśraddhayā hutaṃ dattaṃ tapas taptaṃ kṛtaṃ ca yat Bhg_17.028a
GE07bhgce__u:1295: asad ity ucyate pārtha na ca tat pretya no iha Bhg_17.028c
GE07bhgce__u:1297: saṃnyāsasya mahābāho tattvam icchāmi veditum Bhg_18.001a
GE07bhgce__u:1298: tyāgasya ca hṛṣīkeśa pṛthak keśiniṣūdana Bhg_18.001c [=MBh_06,040.001c]
GE07bhgce__u:1300: kāmyānāṃ karmaṇāṃ nyāsaṃ saṃnyāsaṃ kavayo viduḥ Bhg_18.002a
GE07bhgce__u:1302: tyājyaṃ doṣavad ity eke karma prāhur manīṣiṇaḥ Bhg_18.003a
GE07bhgce__u:1303: yajñadānatapaḥkarma na tyājyam iti cāpare Bhg_18.003c [=MBh_06,040.003c]
GE07bhgce__u:1304: niścayaṃ śṛṇu me tatra tyāge bharatasattama Bhg_18.004a [=MBh_06,040.004a]
GE07bhgce__u:1305: tyāgo hi puruṣavyāghra trividhaḥ saṃprakīrtitaḥ Bhg_18.004c
GE07bhgce__u:1306: yajñadānatapaḥkarma na tyājyaṃ kāryam eva tat Bhg_18.005a
GE07bhgce__u:1307: yajño dānaṃ tapaś caiva pāvanāni manīṣiṇām Bhg_18.005c [=MBh_06,040.005c]
GE07bhgce__u:1308: etāny api tu karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā phalāni ca Bhg_18.006a
GE07bhgce__u:1309: kartavyānīti me pārtha niścitaṃ matam uttamam Bhg_18.006c
GE07bhgce__u:1310: niyatasya tu saṃnyāsaḥ karmaṇo nopapadyate Bhg_18.007a [=MBh_06,040.007a]
GE07bhgce__u:1311: mohāt tasya parityāgas tāmasaḥ parikīrtitaḥ Bhg_18.007c [=MBh_06,040.007c]
GE07bhgce__u:1312: duḥkham ity eva yat karma kāyakleśabhayāt tyajet Bhg_18.008a
GE07bhgce__u:1313: sa kṛtvā rājasaṃ tyāgaṃ naiva tyāgaphalaṃ labhet Bhg_18.008c
GE07bhgce__u:1314: kāryam ity eva yat karma niyataṃ kriyate 'rjuna Bhg_18.009a
GE07bhgce__u:1315: saṅgaṃ tyaktvā phalaṃ caiva sa tyāgaḥ sāttviko mataḥ Bhg_18.009c
GE07bhgce__u:1316: na dveṣṭy akuśalaṃ karma kuśale nānuṣajjate Bhg_18.010a [=MBh_06,040.010a]
GE07bhgce__u:1318: na hi dehabhṛtā śakyaṃ tyaktuṃ karmāṇy aśeṣataḥ Bhg_18.011a
GE07bhgce__u:1319: yas tu karmaphalatyāgī sa tyāgīty abhidhīyate Bhg_18.011c
GE07bhgce__u:1320: aniṣṭam iṣṭaṃ miśraṃ ca trividhaṃ karmaṇaḥ phalam Bhg_18.012a
GE07bhgce__u:1321: bhavaty atyāgināṃ pretya na tu saṃnyāsināṃ kva cit Bhg_18.012c
GE07bhgce__u:1322: pañcaitāni mahābāho kāraṇāni nibodha me Bhg_18.013a [=MBh_06,040.013a]
GE07bhgce__u:1323: sāṃkhye kṛtānte proktāni siddhaye sarvakarmaṇām Bhg_18.013c
GE07bhgce__u:1324: adhiṣṭhānaṃ tathā kartā karaṇaṃ ca pṛthagvidham Bhg_18.014a
GE07bhgce__u:1325: vividhāś ca pṛthakceṣṭā daivaṃ caivātra pañcamam Bhg_18.014c
GE07bhgce__u:1326: śarīravāṅmanobhir yat karma prārabhate naraḥ Bhg_18.015a
GE07bhgce__u:1327: nyāyyaṃ vā viparītaṃ vā pañcaite tasya hetavaḥ Bhg_18.015c
GE07bhgce__u:1328: tatraivaṃ sati kartāram ātmānaṃ kevalaṃ tu yaḥ Bhg_18.016a
GE07bhgce__u:1329: paśyaty akṛtabuddhitvān na sa paśyati durmatiḥ Bhg_18.016c
GE07bhgce__u:1330: yasya nāhaṃkṛto bhāvo buddhir yasya na lipyate Bhg_18.017a
GE07bhgce__u:1331: hatvāpi sa imāṃl lokān na hanti na nibadhyate Bhg_18.017c
GE07bhgce__u:1332: jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ parijñātā trividhā karmacodanā Bhg_18.018a
GE07bhgce__u:1333: karaṇaṃ karma karteti trividhaḥ karmasaṃgrahaḥ Bhg_18.018c
GE07bhgce__u:1334: jñānaṃ karma ca kartā ca tridhaiva guṇabhedataḥ Bhg_18.019a
GE07bhgce__u:1335: procyate guṇasaṃkhyāne yathāvac chṛṇu tāny api Bhg_18.019c
GE07bhgce__u:1336: sarvabhūteṣu yenaikaṃ bhāvam avyayam īkṣate Bhg_18.020a [=MBh_06,040.020a]
GE07bhgce__u:1337: avibhaktaṃ vibhakteṣu taj jñānaṃ viddhi sāttvikam Bhg_18.020c
GE07bhgce__u:1338: pṛthaktvena tu yaj jñānaṃ nānābhāvān pṛthagvidhān Bhg_18.021a
GE07bhgce__u:1339: vetti sarveṣu bhūteṣu taj jñānaṃ viddhi rājasam Bhg_18.021c
GE07bhgce__u:1340: yat tu kṛtsnavad ekasmin kārye saktam ahaitukam Bhg_18.022a
GE07bhgce__u:1341: atattvārthavad alpaṃ ca tat tāmasam udāhṛtam Bhg_18.022c
GE07bhgce__u:1343: aphalaprepsunā karma yat tat sāttvikam ucyate Bhg_18.023c
GE07bhgce__u:1344: yat tu kāmepsunā karma sāhaṃkāreṇa vā punaḥ Bhg_18.024a [=MBh_06,040.024a]
GE07bhgce__u:1345: kriyate bahulāyāsaṃ tad rājasam udāhṛtam Bhg_18.024c [=MBh_06,040.024c]
GE07bhgce__u:1346: anubandhaṃ kṣayaṃ hiṃsām anapekṣya ca pauruṣam Bhg_18.025a
GE07bhgce__u:1347: mohād ārabhyate karma yat tat tāmasam ucyate Bhg_18.025c
GE07bhgce__u:1349: siddhyasiddhyor nirvikāraḥ kartā sāttvika ucyate Bhg_18.026c
GE07bhgce__u:1352: ayuktaḥ prākṛtaḥ stabdhaḥ śaṭho naikṛtiko 'lasaḥ Bhg_18.028a
GE07bhgce__u:1353: viṣādī dīrghasūtrī ca kartā tāmasa ucyate Bhg_18.028c [=MBh_06,040.028c]
GE07bhgce__u:1354: buddher bhedaṃ dhṛteś caiva guṇatas trividhaṃ śṛṇu Bhg_18.029a
GE07bhgce__u:1356: pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca kāryākārye bhayābhaye Bhg_18.030a
GE07bhgce__u:1357: bandhaṃ mokṣaṃ ca yā vetti buddhiḥ sā pārtha sāttvikī Bhg_18.030c
GE07bhgce__u:1358: yayā dharmam adharmaṃ ca kāryaṃ cākāryam eva ca Bhg_18.031a
GE07bhgce__u:1359: ayathāvat prajānāti buddhiḥ sā pārtha rājasī Bhg_18.031c
GE07bhgce__u:1360: adharmaṃ dharmam iti yā manyate tamasāvṛtā Bhg_18.032a [=MBh_06,040.032a]
GE07bhgce__u:1361: sarvārthān viparītāṃś ca buddhiḥ sā pārtha tāmasī Bhg_18.032c
GE07bhgce__u:1363: yogenāvyabhicāriṇyā dhṛtiḥ sā pārtha sāttvikī Bhg_18.033c
GE07bhgce__u:1364: yayā tu dharmakāmārthān dhṛtyā dhārayate 'rjuna Bhg_18.034a
GE07bhgce__u:1365: prasaṅgena phalākāṅkṣī dhṛtiḥ sā pārtha rājasī Bhg_18.034c
GE07bhgce__u:1366: yayā svapnaṃ bhayaṃ śokaṃ viṣādaṃ madam eva ca Bhg_18.035a
GE07bhgce__u:1367: na vimuñcati durmedhā dhṛtiḥ sā pārtha tāmasī Bhg_18.035c
GE07bhgce__u:1368: sukhaṃ tv idānīṃ trividhaṃ śṛṇu me bharatarṣabha Bhg_18.036a
GE07bhgce__u:1369: abhyāsād ramate yatra duḥkhāntaṃ ca nigacchati Bhg_18.036c
GE07bhgce__u:1370: yat tadagre viṣam iva pariṇāme 'mṛtopamam Bhg_18.037a [=MBh_06,040.037a]
GE07bhgce__u:1371: tat sukhaṃ sāttvikaṃ proktam ātmabuddhiprasādajam Bhg_18.037c
GE07bhgce__u:1373: pariṇāme viṣam iva tat sukhaṃ rājasaṃ smṛtam Bhg_18.038c
GE07bhgce__u:1374: yad agre cānubandhe ca sukhaṃ mohanam ātmanaḥ Bhg_18.039a
GE07bhgce__u:1376: na tad asti pṛthivyāṃ vā divi deveṣu vā punaḥ Bhg_18.040a
GE07bhgce__u:1377: sattvaṃ prakṛtijair muktaṃ yad ebhiḥ syāt tribhir guṇaiḥ Bhg_18.040c
GE07bhgce__u:1380: śamo damas tapaḥ śaucaṃ kṣāntir ārjavam eva ca Bhg_18.042a
GE07bhgce__u:1381: jñānaṃ vijñānam āstikyaṃ brahmakarma svabhāvajam Bhg_18.042c
GE07bhgce__u:1382: śauryaṃ tejo dhṛtir dākṣyaṃ yuddhe cāpy apalāyanam Bhg_18.043a
GE07bhgce__u:1383: dānam īśvarabhāvaś ca kṣatrakarma svabhāvajam Bhg_18.043c
GE07bhgce__u:1386: sve sve karmaṇy abhirataḥ saṃsiddhiṃ labhate naraḥ Bhg_18.045a
GE07bhgce__u:1387: svakarmanirataḥ siddhiṃ yathā vindati tac chṛṇu Bhg_18.045c
GE07bhgce__u:1388: yataḥ pravṛttir bhūtānāṃ yena sarvam idaṃ tatam Bhg_18.046a
GE07bhgce__u:1389: svakarmaṇā tam abhyarcya siddhiṃ vindati mānavaḥ Bhg_18.046c
GE07bhgce__u:1390: śreyān svadharmo viguṇaḥ paradharmāt svanuṣṭhitāt Bhg_18.047a
GE07bhgce__u:1391: svabhāvaniyataṃ karma kurvan nāpnoti kilbiṣam Bhg_18.047c
GE07bhgce__u:1392: sahajaṃ karma kaunteya sadoṣam api na tyajet Bhg_18.048a
GE07bhgce__u:1393: sarvārambhā hi doṣeṇa dhūmenāgnir ivāvṛtāḥ Bhg_18.048c [=MBh_06,040.048c]
GE07bhgce__u:1396: siddhiṃ prāpto yathā brahma tathāpnoti nibodha me Bhg_18.050a
GE07bhgce__u:1397: samāsenaiva kaunteya niṣṭhā jñānasya yā parā Bhg_18.050c
GE07bhgce__u:1398: buddhyā viśuddhayā yukto dhṛtyātmānaṃ niyamya ca Bhg_18.051a
GE07bhgce__u:1399: śabdādīn viṣayāṃs tyaktvā rāgadveṣau vyudasya ca Bhg_18.051c
GE07bhgce__u:1402: ahaṃkāraṃ balaṃ darpaṃ kāmaṃ krodhaṃ parigraham Bhg_18.053a
GE07bhgce__u:1403: vimucya nirmamaḥ śānto brahmabhūyāya kalpate Bhg_18.053c
GE07bhgce__u:1404: brahmabhūtaḥ prasannātmā na śocati na kāṅkṣati Bhg_18.054a
GE07bhgce__u:1405: samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu madbhaktiṃ labhate parām Bhg_18.054c
GE07bhgce__u:1406: bhaktyā mām abhijānāti yāvān yaś cāsmi tattvataḥ Bhg_18.055a
GE07bhgce__u:1407: tato māṃ tattvato jñātvā viśate tadanantaram Bhg_18.055c
GE07bhgce__u:1408: sarvakarmāṇy api sadā kurvāṇo madvyapāśrayaḥ Bhg_18.056a
GE07bhgce__u:1409: matprasādād avāpnoti śāśvataṃ padam avyayam Bhg_18.056c [=MBh_06,040.056c]
GE07bhgce__u:1410: cetasā sarvakarmāṇi mayi saṃnyasya matparaḥ Bhg_18.057a [=MBh_06,040.057a]
GE07bhgce__u:1411: buddhiyogam upāśritya maccittaḥ satataṃ bhava Bhg_18.057c
GE07bhgce__u:1413: atha cet tvam ahaṃkārān na śroṣyasi vinaṅkṣyasi Bhg_18.058c
GE07bhgce__u:1414: yad ahaṃkāram āśritya na yotsya iti manyase Bhg_18.059a [=MBh_06,040.059a]
GE07bhgce__u:1415: mithyaiṣa vyavasāyas te prakṛtis tvāṃ niyokṣyati Bhg_18.059c
GE07bhgce__u:1416: svabhāvajena kaunteya nibaddhaḥ svena karmaṇā Bhg_18.060a
GE07bhgce__u:1417: kartuṃ necchasi yan mohāt kariṣyasy avaśo 'pi tat Bhg_18.060c
GE07bhgce__u:1420: tam eva śaraṇaṃ gaccha sarvabhāvena bhārata Bhg_18.062a [=MBh_06,040.062a]
GE07bhgce__u:1421: tatprasādāt parāṃ śāntiṃ sthānaṃ prāpsyasi śāśvatam Bhg_18.062c
GE07bhgce__u:1422: iti te jñānam ākhyātaṃ guhyād guhyataraṃ mayā Bhg_18.063a
GE07bhgce__u:1423: vimṛśyaitad aśeṣeṇa yathecchasi tathā kuru Bhg_18.063c [=MBh_06,040.063c]
GE07bhgce__u:1424: sarvaguhyatamaṃ bhūyaḥ śṛṇu me paramaṃ vacaḥ Bhg_18.064a
GE07bhgce__u:1425: iṣṭo 'si me dṛḍham iti tato vakṣyāmi te hitam Bhg_18.064c
GE07bhgce__u:1426: manmanā bhava madbhakto madyājī māṃ namaskuru Bhg_18.065a
GE07bhgce__u:1427: mām evaiṣyasi satyaṃ te pratijāne priyo 'si me Bhg_18.065c
GE07bhgce__u:1428: sarvadharmān parityajya mām ekaṃ śaraṇaṃ vraja Bhg_18.066a
GE07bhgce__u:1429: ahaṃ tvā sarvapāpebhyo mokṣayiṣyāmi mā śucaḥ Bhg_18.066c
GE07bhgce__u:1430: idaṃ te nātapaskāya nābhaktāya kadā cana Bhg_18.067a [=MBh_06,040.067a]
GE07bhgce__u:1431: na cāśuśrūṣave vācyaṃ na ca māṃ yo 'bhyasūyati Bhg_18.067c
GE07bhgce__u:1432: ya idaṃ paramaṃ guhyaṃ madbhakteṣv abhidhāsyati Bhg_18.068a
GE07bhgce__u:1433: bhaktiṃ mayi parāṃ kṛtvā mām evaiṣyaty asaṃśayaḥ Bhg_18.068c
GE07bhgce__u:1434: na ca tasmān manuṣyeṣu kaś cin me priyakṛttamaḥ Bhg_18.069a
GE07bhgce__u:1435: bhavitā na ca me tasmād anyaḥ priyataro bhuvi Bhg_18.069c
GE07bhgce__u:1436: adhyeṣyate ca ya imaṃ dharmyaṃ saṃvādam āvayoḥ Bhg_18.070a
GE07bhgce__u:1437: jñānayajñena tenāham iṣṭaḥ syām iti me matiḥ Bhg_18.070c
GE07bhgce__u:1438: śraddhāvān anasūyaś ca śṛṇuyād api yo naraḥ Bhg_18.071a [=MBh_06,040.071a]
GE07bhgce__u:1439: so 'pi muktaḥ śubhāṃl lokān prāpnuyāt puṇyakarmaṇām Bhg_18.071c
GE07bhgce__u:1440: kaccid etac chrutaṃ pārtha tvayaikāgreṇa cetasā Bhg_18.072a
GE07bhgce__u:1441: kaccid ajñānasaṃmohaḥ pranaṣṭas te dhanaṃjaya Bhg_18.072c
GE07bhgce__u:1443: naṣṭo mohaḥ smṛtir labdhā tvatprasādān mayācyuta Bhg_18.073a
GE07bhgce__u:1444: sthito 'smi gatasaṃdehaḥ kariṣye vacanaṃ tava Bhg_18.073c
GE07bhgce__u:1446: ity ahaṃ vāsudevasya pārthasya ca mahātmanaḥ Bhg_18.074a
GE07bhgce__u:1447: saṃvādam imam aśrauṣam adbhutaṃ romaharṣaṇam Bhg_18.074c
GE07bhgce__u:1448: vyāsaprasādāc chrutavān etad guhyam ahaṃ param Bhg_18.075a
GE07bhgce__u:1449: yogaṃ yogeśvarāt kṛṣṇāt sākṣāt kathayataḥ svayam Bhg_18.075c
GE07bhgce__u:1450: rājan saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya saṃvādam imam adbhutam Bhg_18.076a
GE07bhgce__u:1451: keśavārjunayoḥ puṇyaṃ hṛṣyāmi ca muhur muhuḥ Bhg_18.076c
GE07bhgce__u:1452: tac ca saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya rūpam atyadbhutaṃ hareḥ Bhg_18.077a
GE07bhgce__u:1453: vismayo me mahān rājan hṛṣyāmi ca punaḥ punaḥ Bhg_18.077c
GE07bhgce__u:1454: yatra yogeśvaraḥ kṛṣṇo yatra pārtho dhanurdharaḥ Bhg_18.078a
GE07bhgce__u:1455: tatra śrīr vijayo bhūtir dhruvā nītir matir mama Bhg_18.078c
